an8.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an8.1:2.1_2: cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya aṭṭhānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
an8.1:2.3_6: nāssa aggi vā visaṁ vā satthaṁ vā kamati,
an8.1:2.4_2: cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya ime aṭṭhānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhāti.
an8.2:1.1_2: hetū aṭṭha paccayā ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
an8.2:1.1_3: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattanti.
an8.2:1.3_2: bhikkhu satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ,
an8.2:1.3_3: yatthassa tibbaṁ hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca.
an8.2:1.4_2: paṭhamo hetu paṭhamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
an8.2:1.4_3: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
an8.2:2.1_0: So taṁ satthāraṁ upanissāya viharanto aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ,
an8.2:2.1_1: yatthassa tibbaṁ hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti pemañca gāravo ca,
an8.2:2.1_2: te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati:
an8.2:2.3_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti.
an8.2:2.4_2: dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
an8.2:2.4_3: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
an8.2:3.1_0: So taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā dvayena vūpakāsena sampādeti—kāyavūpakāsena ca cittavūpakāsena ca.
an8.2:3.2_2: tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
an8.2:3.2_3: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
an8.2:4.1_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an8.2:4.2_2: catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
an8.2:4.2_3: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.

an8.2:5.1_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.

an8.2:7.3_2: sattamo hetu sattamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
an8.2:7.3_3: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.
an8.2:8.1_0: Pañcasu kho pana upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati:
an8.2:8.2_0: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
an8.2:8.3_0: iti vedanā, iti vedanāya samudayo, iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo;
an8.2:8.6_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
an8.2:8.7_2: aṭṭhamo hetu aṭṭhamo paccayo ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāya appaṭiladdhāya paṭilābhāya,
an8.2:8.7_3: paṭiladdhāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṁvattati.

an8.3:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an8.3:1.4_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an8.3:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an8.3:2.4_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an8.4:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.

an8.5:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti, loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati.
an8.5:1.3_0: Lābho ca, alābho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, nindā ca, pasaṁsā ca, sukhañca, dukkhañca.
an8.5:1.4_3: loko ca ime aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatīti.
an8.6:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti, loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati.
an8.6:1.3_0: Lābho ca, alābho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, nindā ca, pasaṁsā ca, sukhañca, dukkhañca.
an8.6:1.4_3: loko ca ime aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati.
an8.6:2.1_2: puthujjanassa uppajjati lābhopi alābhopi yasopi ayasopi nindāpi pasaṁsāpi sukhampi dukkhampi.
an8.6:2.2_2: ariyasāvakassa uppajjati lābhopi alābhopi yasopi ayasopi nindāpi pasaṁsāpi sukhampi dukkhampi.
an8.6:2.3_2: ko viseso ko adhippayāso kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenā”ti?
an8.6:3.1_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.6:3.2_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an8.6:3.7_0: so ca kho anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an8.6:3.17_0: tañca kho aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhamman’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
an8.6:4.2_0: So uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anurujjhati, alābhe paṭivirujjhati;
an8.6:4.6_0: So evaṁ anurodhavirodhasamāpanno na parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
an8.6:5.1_0: Sutavato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa uppajjati lābho.
an8.6:5.4_0: so ca kho anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an8.6:5.14_0: tañca kho aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhamman’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an8.6:6.1_0: Tassa lābhopi cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
an8.6:6.2_0: So uppannaṁ lābhaṁ nānurujjhati, alābhe nappaṭivirujjhati;
an8.6:6.6_0: So evaṁ anurodhavirodhavippahīno parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
an8.6:6.8_2: viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenāti.
an8.7:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
an8.7:1.2_0: Tatra bhagavā devadattaṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.7:1.3_0: “sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.7:1.4_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paravipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.7:1.5_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.7:1.6_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ parasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.7:1.7_2: asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.7:2.2_0: Lābhena hi, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.7:2.9_0: pāpamittatāya, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.7:2.10_2: aṭṭhahi asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.7:3.1_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya,
an8.7:4.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya,
an8.7:5.1_2: uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā,
an8.7:5.1_3: uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.7:5.8_0: uppannaṁ pāpamittataṁ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā,
an8.7:5.8_1: uppannaṁ pāpamittataṁ abhibhuyya viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.7:5.9_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya,
an8.8:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā uttaro mahisavatthusmiṁ viharati saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ.
an8.8:1.2_0: Tatra kho āyasmā uttaro bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.8:1.3_0: “sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:1.4_0: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paravipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:1.5_0: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:1.6_0: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ parasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hotī”ti.
an8.8:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ gacchati kenacideva karaṇīyena.
an8.8:2.2_0: Assosi kho vessavaṇo mahārājā āyasmato uttarassa mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desentassa:
an8.8:2.3_0: “sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:2.4_0: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paravipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:2.5_0: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:2.6_0: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ parasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hotī”ti.
an8.8:3.1_0: Atha kho vessavaṇo mahārājā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
an8.8:3.1_2: evamevaṁ mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ antarahito devesu tāvatiṁsesu pāturahosi.
an8.8:3.2_0: Atha kho vessavaṇo mahārājā yena sakko devānamindo tenupasaṅkami;
an8.8:3.4_0: Eso āyasmā uttaro mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
an8.8:3.5_0: ‘sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:4.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
an8.8:4.1_2: evamevaṁ devesu tāvatiṁsesu antarahito mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ āyasmato uttarassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
an8.8:4.2_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo yenāyasmā uttaro tenupasaṅkami;
an8.8:4.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ uttaraṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
an8.8:4.2_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṁ uttaraṁ etadavoca:
an8.8:5.1_0: “Saccaṁ kira, bhante, āyasmā uttaro bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desesi:
an8.8:5.2_0: ‘sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti,
an8.8:5.7_2: udāhu tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti?
an8.8:5.9_0: Upamāya m’idhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānanti.
an8.8:6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, devānaminda, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahādhaññarāsi.
an8.8:6.4_0: Yo nu kho, devānaminda, taṁ mahājanakāyaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ puccheyya:
an8.8:6.6_0: “‘Amumhā mahādhaññarāsimhā āharāmā’ti kho, bhante, so mahājanakāyo sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
an8.8:6.7_2: yaṁ kiñci subhāsitaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
an8.8:6.8_0: Tato upādāyupādāya mayaṁ caññe ca bhaṇāmā”ti.
an8.8:7.3_0: ‘yaṁ kiñci subhāsitaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
an8.8:7.5_2: samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
an8.8:7.6_0: Tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.8:8.1_0: ‘Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:8.2_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paravipattiṁ …pe…
an8.8:8.5_2: asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:8.7_0: Lābhena hi, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho;
an8.8:8.14_0: pāpamittatāya, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:8.15_2: aṭṭhahi asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:9.1_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:10.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:11.1_2: uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā,
an8.8:11.1_3: uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.8:11.8_0: uppannaṁ pāpamittataṁ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā,
an8.8:11.8_1: uppannaṁ pāpamittataṁ abhibhuyya viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.8:11.9_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:13.1_0: Ettāvatā, bhante uttara, manussesu catasso parisā—
an8.8:13.4_0: Uggaṇhatu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ.
an8.8:13.5_0: Pariyāpuṇātu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ.
an8.8:13.6_0: Dhāretu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ.
an8.9:1.5_6: yehi nando sakkoti paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
an8.9:1.6_0: Tatridaṁ, bhikkhave, nandassa indriyesu guttadvāratāya hoti.
an8.9:1.7_3: sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṁ disaṁ āloketi:
an8.9:1.8_0: ‘evaṁ me puratthimaṁ disaṁ ālokayato nābhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti.
an8.9:2.1_0: Sace, bhikkhave, nandassa pacchimā disā āloketabbā hoti …pe…
an8.9:2.6_0: anudisā anuviloketabbā hoti, sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṁ anuviloketi:
an8.9:2.7_0: ‘evaṁ me anudisaṁ anuvilokayato nābhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti.
an8.9:2.9_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, nandassa indriyesu guttadvāratāya hoti.
an8.9:3.1_0: Tatridaṁ, bhikkhave, nandassa bhojane mattaññutāya hoti.
an8.9:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, nando paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṁ āhāreti:
an8.9:3.3_0: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
an8.9:3.3_1: yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṁsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya iti purāṇañca vedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
an8.9:3.3_3: yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
an8.9:3.4_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, nandassa bhojane mattaññutāya hoti.
an8.9:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, nando divasaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti;
an8.9:4.3_0: rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti;
an8.9:4.4_0: rattiyā majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappeti pāde pādaṁ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasi karitvā;
an8.9:4.5_0: rattiyā pacchimaṁ yāmaṁ paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti.
an8.9:4.6_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, nandassa jāgariyānuyogasmiṁ hoti.
an8.9:5.5_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, nandassa satisampajaññasmiṁ hoti.
an8.9:6.1_6: yehi nando sakkoti paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ caritun”ti.
an8.10:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā campāyaṁ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre.
an8.10:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.10:1.3_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno aññenāññaṁ paṭicarati,
an8.10:2.6_2: ekaccassa puggalassa tādisaṁyeva hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ,
an8.10:2.8_0: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhū āpattiṁ passanti, tamenaṁ evaṁ jānanti:
an8.10:3.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sampanne yavakaraṇe yavadūsī jāyetha yavapalāpo yavakāraṇḍavoti.
an8.10:3.2_0: Tassa tādisaṁyeva mūlaṁ hoti, seyyathāpi aññesaṁ bhaddakānaṁ yavānaṁ;
an8.10:3.3_0: tādisaṁyeva nāḷaṁ hoti, seyyathāpi aññesaṁ bhaddakānaṁ yavānaṁ;
an8.10:3.4_0: tādisaṁyeva pattaṁ hoti, seyyathāpi aññesaṁ bhaddakānaṁ yavānaṁ—
an8.10:3.6_0: Yato ca khvassa sīsaṁ nibbattati, tamenaṁ evaṁ jānanti:
an8.10:3.8_0: Tamenaṁ iti viditvā samūlaṁ uppāṭetvā bahiddhā yavakaraṇassa chaḍḍenti.
an8.10:4.1_2: idhekaccassa puggalassa tādisaṁyeva hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ,
an8.10:4.3_0: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhū āpattiṁ passanti, tamenaṁ evaṁ jānanti:
an8.10:5.1_2: mahato dhaññarāsissa phuṇamānassa tattha yāni tāni dhaññāni daḷhāni sāravantāni tāni ekamantaṁ puñjaṁ hoti,
an8.10:5.1_3: yāni pana tāni dhaññāni dubbalāni palāpāni tāni vāto ekamantaṁ apavahati.
an8.10:5.2_0: Tamenaṁ sāmikā sammajjaniṁ gahetvā bhiyyoso mattāya apasammajjanti.
an8.10:5.5_2: idhekaccassa puggalassa tādisaṁyeva hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ,
an8.10:5.7_0: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhū āpattiṁ passanti, tamenaṁ evaṁ jānanti:
an8.10:6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso udapānapanāḷiyatthiko tiṇhaṁ kuṭhāriṁ ādāya vanaṁ paviseyya.
an8.10:6.2_0: So yaṁ yadeva rukkhaṁ kuṭhāripāsena ākoṭeyya tattha yāni tāni rukkhāni daḷhāni sāravantāni tāni kuṭhāripāsena ākoṭitāni kakkhaḷaṁ paṭinadanti;
an8.10:6.3_0: yāni pana tāni rukkhāni antopūtīni avassutāni kasambujātāni tāni kuṭhāripāsena ākoṭitāni daddaraṁ paṭinadanti.
an8.10:6.5_2: idhekaccassa puggalassa tādisaṁyeva hoti abhikkantaṁ paṭikkantaṁ ālokitaṁ vilokitaṁ samiñjitaṁ pasāritaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṁ,
an8.10:6.7_0: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhū āpattiṁ passanti, tamenaṁ evaṁ jānanti:
an8.11:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā verañjāyaṁ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle.
an8.11:1.3_0: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an8.11:1.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.11:1.4_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.11:2.2_0: ‘na samaṇo gotamo brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimantetī’ti.
an8.11:2.4_0: Na hi bhavaṁ gotamo brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimanteti.
an8.11:2.6_1: passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yamahaṁ abhivādeyyaṁ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṁ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṁ.
an8.11:2.7_1: tathāgato abhivādeyya vā paccuṭṭheyya vā āsanena vā nimanteyya,
an8.11:3.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:3.4_2: te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an8.11:3.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:3.6_0: ‘arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
an8.11:4.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:4.4_2: te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an8.11:4.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:4.6_0: ‘nibbhogo samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
an8.11:5.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:5.4_2: anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ akiriyaṁ vadāmi.
an8.11:5.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:5.6_0: ‘akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
an8.11:6.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:6.4_2: anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ucchedaṁ vadāmi.
an8.11:6.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:6.6_0: ‘ucchedavādo samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
an8.11:7.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:7.4_2: jigucchāmi anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā.
an8.11:7.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:7.6_0: ‘jegucchī samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
an8.11:8.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:8.4_1: vinayāya dhammaṁ desemi rāgassa dosassa mohassa;
an8.11:8.4_2: anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vinayāya dhammaṁ desemi.
an8.11:8.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:8.6_0: ‘venayiko samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
an8.11:9.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:9.4_0: Tapanīyāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, pāpake akusale dhamme vadāmi kāyaduccaritaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ.
an8.11:9.5_1: tapanīyā pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā,
an8.11:9.6_1: tapanīyā pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an8.11:9.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:9.8_0: ‘tapassī samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesī”ti.
an8.11:10.2_0: “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:10.4_1: āyatiṁ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā,
an8.11:10.5_1: āyatiṁ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an8.11:10.6_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.11:10.7_0: ‘apagabbho samaṇo gotamo’ti, no ca kho yaṁ tvaṁ sandhāya vadesi.
an8.11:11.1_0: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā.
an8.11:11.2_0: Tānāssu kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitāni sammā pariseditāni sammā paribhāvitāni.
an8.11:11.3_0: Yo nu kho tesaṁ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṁ paṭhamataraṁ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyya,
an8.11:11.4_0: “Jeṭṭho tissa, bho gotama, vacanīyo. So hi nesaṁ, bho gotama, jeṭṭho hotī”ti.
an8.11:12.1_1: avijjāgatāya pajāya aṇḍabhūtāya pariyonaddhāya avijjaṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā ekova loke anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho.
an8.11:13.2_1: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi;
an8.11:13.3_0: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi;
an8.11:13.4_0: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharāmi sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedemi yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
an8.11:13.4_1: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi;
an8.11:13.5_0: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ
an8.11:14.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an8.11:14.2_1: seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi
an8.11:14.2_2: jātiyo tiṁsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi
an8.11:14.2_3: anekepi saṁvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe:
an8.11:14.2_4: ‘amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto.
an8.11:14.2_6: tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto.
an8.11:14.2_8: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarāmi.
an8.11:15.1_0: Ayaṁ kho me, brāhmaṇa, rattiyā paṭhame yāme paṭhamā vijjā adhigatā;
an8.11:15.2_2: yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an8.11:15.3_0: Ayaṁ kho me, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā.
an8.11:16.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an8.11:16.2_0: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an8.11:16.2_8: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannāti.
an8.11:16.2_9: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā,
an8.11:16.2_15: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannā’ti.
an8.11:16.2_16: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an8.11:17.1_0: Ayaṁ kho me, brāhmaṇa, rattiyā majjhime yāme dutiyā vijjā adhigatā;
an8.11:17.2_2: yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an8.11:17.3_0: Ayaṁ kho me, brāhmaṇa, dutiyā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā.
an8.11:18.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an8.11:18.4_0: Tassa me evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha,
an8.11:18.6_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsiṁ.
an8.11:19.1_0: Ayaṁ kho me, brāhmaṇa, rattiyā pacchime yāme tatiyā vijjā adhigatā;
an8.11:19.2_2: yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an8.11:19.3_0: Ayaṁ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tatiyā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā”ti.
an8.11:20.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.11:20.3_0: Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama.
an8.11:20.4_7: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an8.11:20.5_0: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an8.11:20.6_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an8.12:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an8.12:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī santhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti,
an8.12:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sīho senāpati nigaṇṭhasāvako tassaṁ parisāyaṁ nisinno hoti.
an8.12:2.3_0: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhavissati,
an8.12:2.3_1: tathā hime sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī santhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti,
an8.12:2.4_0: Yannūnāhaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
an8.12:2.5_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkami;
an8.12:3.1_0: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, sīha, kiriyavādo samāno akiriyavādaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi?
an8.12:3.2_0: Samaṇo hi, sīha, gotamo akiriyavādo, akiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī”ti.
an8.12:3.3_0: Atha kho sīhassa senāpatissa yo ahosi gamiyābhisaṅkhāro bhagavantaṁ dassanāya, so paṭippassambhi.
an8.12:4.1_0: Dutiyampi kho sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī santhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa …pe…
an8.12:4.3_0: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhavissati,
an8.12:4.3_1: tathā hime sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī santhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti,
an8.12:4.4_0: Yannūnāhaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
an8.12:4.5_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkami;
an8.12:5.1_0: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, sīha, kiriyavādo samāno akiriyavādaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi?
an8.12:5.2_0: Samaṇo hi, sīha, gotamo akiriyavādo akiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī”ti.
an8.12:5.3_0: Dutiyampi kho sīhassa senāpatissa yo ahosi gamiyābhisaṅkhāro bhagavantaṁ dassanāya,
an8.12:6.1_0: Tatiyampi kho sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī santhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa …pe…
an8.12:6.3_0: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhavissati,
an8.12:6.3_1: tathā hime sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī santhāgāre sannisinnā sannipatitā anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti,
an8.12:6.4_0: Kiṁ hime karissanti nigaṇṭhā apalokitā vā anapalokitā vā?
an8.12:6.5_0: Yannūnāhaṁ anapaloketvāva nigaṇṭhe taṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
an8.12:7.1_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati pañcamattehi rathasatehi divādivassa vesāliyā niyyāsi bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
an8.12:7.2_0: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikova agamāsi.
an8.12:7.3_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.12:7.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho sīho senāpati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.12:8.2_0: ‘akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:8.3_4: tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti, kacci te, bhante,
an8.12:8.3_5: bhagavato vuttavādino na ca bhagavantaṁ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti dhammassa cānudhammaṁ byākaronti na ca
an8.12:8.3_6: koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchati?
an8.12:9.1_0: “Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:9.2_0: ‘akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:10.1_0: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:10.2_0: ‘kiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, kiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:11.1_0: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:11.2_0: ‘ucchedavādo samaṇo gotamo, ucchedāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:12.1_0: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:12.2_0: ‘jegucchī samaṇo gotamo, jegucchitāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:13.1_0: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:13.2_0: ‘venayiko samaṇo gotamo, vinayāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:14.1_0: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:14.2_0: ‘tapassī samaṇo gotamo, tapassitāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:15.1_0: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:15.2_0: ‘apagabbho samaṇo gotamo, apagabbhatāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:16.1_0: Atthi, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:16.2_0: ‘assāsako samaṇo gotamo, assāsāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:17.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:17.2_0: ‘akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:17.3_0: Ahañhi, sīha, akiriyaṁ vadāmi kāyaduccaritassa vacīduccaritassa manoduccaritassa;
an8.12:17.4_0: anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ akiriyaṁ vadāmi.
an8.12:17.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:17.6_0: ‘akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, akiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:18.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:18.2_0: ‘kiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, kiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:18.3_0: Ahañhi, sīha, kiriyaṁ vadāmi kāyasucaritassa vacīsucaritassa manosucaritassa;
an8.12:18.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:18.6_0: ‘kiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo, kiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:19.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:19.2_0: ‘ucchedavādo samaṇo gotamo, ucchedāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:19.3_0: Ahañhi, sīha, ucchedaṁ vadāmi rāgassa dosassa mohassa;
an8.12:19.4_0: anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ucchedaṁ vadāmi.
an8.12:19.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:19.6_0: ‘ucchedavādo samaṇo gotamo, ucchedāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:20.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:20.2_0: ‘jegucchī samaṇo gotamo, jegucchitāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:20.3_0: Ahañhi, sīha, jigucchāmi kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena;
an8.12:20.4_0: jigucchāmi anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā.
an8.12:20.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:20.6_0: ‘jegucchī samaṇo gotamo, jegucchitāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:21.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:21.2_0: ‘venayiko samaṇo gotamo, vinayāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:21.3_0: Ahañhi, sīha, vinayāya dhammaṁ desemi rāgassa dosassa mohassa;
an8.12:21.4_0: anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vinayāya dhammaṁ desemi.
an8.12:21.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:21.6_0: ‘venayiko samaṇo gotamo, vinayāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:22.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:22.2_0: ‘tapassī samaṇo gotamo, tapassitāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:22.3_0: Tapanīyāhaṁ, sīha, pāpake akusale dhamme vadāmi kāyaduccaritaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ.
an8.12:22.4_1: tapanīyā pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā,
an8.12:22.5_1: tapanīyā pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an8.12:22.6_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:22.7_0: ‘tapassī samaṇo gotamo, tapassitāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:23.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:23.2_0: ‘apagabbho samaṇo gotamo, apagabbhatāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:23.3_1: āyatiṁ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā,
an8.12:23.4_1: āyatiṁ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an8.12:23.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:23.6_0: ‘apagabbho samaṇo gotamo, apagabbhatāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti.
an8.12:24.1_0: Katamo ca, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:24.2_0: ‘assāsako samaṇo gotamo, assāsāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’ti?
an8.12:24.3_0: Ahañhi, sīha, assāsako paramena assāsena, assāsāya dhammaṁ desemi, tena ca sāvake vinemi.
an8.12:24.4_0: Ayaṁ kho, sīha, pariyāyo, yena maṁ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an8.12:24.5_0: ‘assāsako samaṇo gotamo, assāsāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī’”ti.
an8.12:25.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, sīho senāpati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.12:25.3_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an8.12:26.1_0: “Anuviccakāraṁ kho, sīha, karohi. Anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī”ti.
an8.12:26.3_0: Mañhi, bhante, aññatitthiyā sāvakaṁ labhitvā kevalakappaṁ vesāliṁ paṭākaṁ parihareyyuṁ:
an8.12:26.6_0: Esāhaṁ, bhante, dutiyampi bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an8.12:26.7_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an8.12:27.1_2: yena nesaṁ upagatānaṁ piṇḍakaṁ dātabbaṁ maññeyyāsī”ti.
an8.12:27.2_0: “Imināpāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyoso mattāya attamano abhiraddho, yaṁ maṁ bhagavā evamāha:
an8.12:27.3_2: yena nesaṁ upagatānaṁ piṇḍakaṁ dātabbaṁ maññeyyāsī’ti.
an8.12:27.6_0: mayhameva dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dātabbaṁ;
an8.12:27.7_0: mayhameva dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, na aññesaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ;
an8.12:27.8_0: mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, na aññesaṁ sāvakānaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalan’ti,
an8.12:27.9_0: atha ca pana maṁ bhagavā nigaṇṭhesupi dāne samādapeti.
an8.12:27.10_0: Api ca, bhante, mayamettha kālaṁ jānissāma.
an8.12:27.11_0: Esāhaṁ, bhante, tatiyampi bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an8.12:27.12_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an8.12:28.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sīhassa senāpatissa anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
an8.12:28.2_0: dānakathaṁ sīlakathaṁ saggakathaṁ, kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṅkilesaṁ nekkhamme ānisaṁsaṁ pakāsesi.
an8.12:28.3_0: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi sīhaṁ senāpatiṁ kallacittaṁ muducittaṁ vinīvaraṇacittaṁ udaggacittaṁ pasannacittaṁ,
an8.12:28.3_1: atha yā buddhānaṁ sāmukkaṁsikā dhammadesanā taṁ pakāsesi—
an8.12:28.5_0: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṁ vatthaṁ apagatakāḷakaṁ sammadeva rajanaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya;
an8.12:28.6_0: evamevaṁ sīhassa senāpatissa tasmiṁyeva āsane virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi:
an8.12:29.1_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho
an8.12:29.2_0: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
an8.12:29.4_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an8.12:30.1_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati aññataraṁ purisaṁ āmantesi:
an8.12:30.3_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi:
an8.12:31.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sīhassa senāpatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an8.12:31.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
an8.12:31.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā nigaṇṭhā vesāliyaṁ rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ bāhā paggayha kandanti:
an8.12:31.3_0: “ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlaṁ pasuṁ vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattaṁ kataṁ.
an8.12:31.4_0: Taṁ samaṇo gotamo jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman”ti.
an8.12:32.1_0: Atha kho aññataro puriso yena sīho senāpati tenupasaṅkami;
an8.12:32.3_0: Ete sambahulā nigaṇṭhā vesāliyaṁ rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ bāhā paggayha kandanti:
an8.12:32.4_0: ‘ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlaṁ pasuṁ vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattaṁ kataṁ.
an8.12:32.5_0: Taṁ samaṇo gotamo jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman’ti.
an8.12:32.6_0: Alaṁ ayyo dīgharattañhi te āyasmanto avaṇṇakāmā buddhassa avaṇṇakāmā dhammassa avaṇṇakāmā saṅghassa.
an8.12:32.7_0: Na ca panete āyasmanto jiridanti taṁ bhagavantaṁ asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhituṁ;
an8.12:32.8_0: na ca mayaṁ jīvitahetupi sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropeyyāmā”ti.
an8.12:33.1_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
an8.12:33.2_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.12:33.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho sīhaṁ senāpatiṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
an8.13:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhaddo assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an8.13:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño bhaddo assājānīyo ubhato sujāto hoti—
an8.13:1.5_0: Yassaṁ disāyaṁ aññepi bhaddā assājānīyā jāyanti, tassaṁ disāyaṁ jāto hoti.
an8.13:1.9_0: Jegucchī hoti uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā abhinisīdituṁ vā abhinipajjituṁ vā.
an8.13:1.10_0: Sorato hoti sukhasaṁvāso, na ca aññe asse ubbejetā.
an8.13:1.11_0: Yāni kho panassa honti sāṭheyyāni kūṭeyyāni jimheyyāni vaṅkeyyāni,
an8.13:1.14_0: ‘Kāmaññe assā vahantu vā mā vā, ahamettha vahissāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādeti.
an8.13:1.16_0: Thāmavā hoti yāva jīvitamaraṇapariyādānā thāmaṁ upadaṁsetā.
an8.13:1.17_2: aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhaddo assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an8.13:2.1_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an8.13:2.3_3: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an8.13:2.8_0: jegucchī hoti anekavihitānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā.
an8.13:2.9_0: Sorato hoti sukhasaṁvāso, na aññe bhikkhū ubbejetā.
an8.13:2.10_0: Yāni kho panassa honti sāṭheyyāni kūṭeyyāni jimheyyāni vaṅkeyyāni,
an8.13:2.10_1: tāni yathābhūtaṁ āvikattā hoti satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu.
an8.13:2.11_0: Tesamassa satthā vā viññū vā sabrahmacārī abhinimmadanāya vāyamati.
an8.13:2.13_0: ‘Kāmaññe bhikkhū sikkhantu vā mā vā, ahamettha sikkhissāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādeti.
an8.13:2.18_0: ‘kāmaṁ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
an8.13:2.18_2: yaṁ taṁ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṁ,
an8.13:2.18_3: na taṁ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
an8.13:2.19_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an8.14:1.1_3: aṭṭha ca purisakhaḷuṅke aṭṭha ca purisadose.
an8.14:1.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.14:1.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an8.14:2.1_0: “Katame ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭha assakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca assadosā?
an8.14:2.2_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭikkamati,
an8.14:3.1_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati,
an8.14:4.1_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā rathīsāya satthiṁ ussajjitvā rathīsaṁyeva ajjhomaddati.
an8.14:5.1_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā ummaggaṁ gaṇhati,
an8.14:6.1_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā laṅghati purimakāyaṁ paggaṇhati purime pāde.
an8.14:7.1_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā anādiyitvā sārathiṁ anādiyitvā patodalaṭṭhiṁ dantehi mukhādhānaṁ vidhaṁsitvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
an8.14:8.1_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā neva abhikkamati no paṭikkamati tattheva khīlaṭṭhāyī ṭhito hoti.
an8.14:9.1_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā purime ca pāde saṁharitvā pacchime ca pāde saṁharitvā tattheva cattāro pāde abhinisīdati.
an8.14:9.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha assakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca assadosā.
an8.14:10.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭha purisakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca purisadosā?
an8.14:10.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:10.3_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno ‘na sarāmī’ti asatiyā nibbeṭheti.
an8.14:10.4_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭikkamati,
an8.14:11.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:11.2_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno codakaṁyeva paṭippharati:
an8.14:11.3_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho tuyhaṁ bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena.
an8.14:11.5_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati,
an8.14:12.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:12.2_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno codakasseva paccāropeti:
an8.14:12.3_0: ‘tvaṁ khosi itthannāmaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno, tvaṁ tāva paṭhamaṁ paṭikarohī’ti.
an8.14:12.4_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā rathīsāya satthiṁ ussajjitvā rathīsaṁyeva ajjhomaddati;
an8.14:13.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:13.2_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno aññenāññaṁ paṭicarati,
an8.14:13.3_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā ummaggaṁ gaṇhati,
an8.14:14.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:14.2_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno saṅghamajjhe bāhuvikkhepaṁ karoti.
an8.14:15.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:15.2_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno anādiyitvā saṅghaṁ anādiyitvā codakaṁ sāpattikova yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
an8.14:15.3_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā anādiyitvā sārathiṁ anādiyitvā patodalaṭṭhiṁ dantehi mukhādhānaṁ vidhaṁsitvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati;
an8.14:16.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:16.2_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno ‘nevāhaṁ āpannomhi,
an8.14:16.2_1: na panāhaṁ āpannomhī’ti so tuṇhībhāvena saṅghaṁ viheṭheti.
an8.14:16.3_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā neva abhikkamati no paṭikkamati tattheva khīlaṭṭhāyī ṭhito hoti;
an8.14:17.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā codenti.
an8.14:17.2_0: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi āpattiyā codiyamāno evamāha:
an8.14:17.3_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho tumhe āyasmanto atibāḷhaṁ mayi byāvaṭā yāva idānāhaṁ sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī’ti.
an8.14:17.6_3: viddho samāno codito sārathinā purime ca pāde saṁharitvā pacchime ca pāde saṁharitvā tattheva cattāro pāde abhinisīdati;
an8.14:17.10_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha purisakhaḷuṅkā aṭṭha ca purisadosā”ti.
an8.15:1.9_0: malā, bhikkhave, pāpakā akusalā dhammā asmiṁ loke paramhi ca;
an8.15:1.10_0: tato, bhikkhave, malā malataraṁ avijjā paramaṁ malaṁ.
an8.16:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu dūteyyaṁ gantumarahati.
an8.16:1.4_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu dūteyyaṁ gantumarahati.
an8.16:1.5_0: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto dūteyyaṁ gantumarahati.
an8.16:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto dūteyyaṁ gantumarahatīti.
an8.17:1.11_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahākārehi itthī purisaṁ bandhati.
an8.17:1.12_0: Te, bhikkhave, sattā subaddhā, ye phassena baddhā”ti.
an8.18:1.11_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahākārehi puriso itthiṁ bandhati.
an8.18:1.12_0: Te, bhikkhave, sattā subaddhā, ye phassena baddhā”ti.
an8.19:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā verañjāyaṁ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle.
an8.19:1.2_0: Atha kho pahārādo asurindo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.19:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho pahārādaṁ asurindaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an8.19:2.3_2: ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantī”ti?
an8.19:2.4_0: “Aṭṭha, bhante, mahāsamudde acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:2.6_0: Mahāsamuddo, bhante, anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto.
an8.19:2.7_0: Yampi, bhante, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto;
an8.19:2.8_2: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati.
an8.19:3.2_0: Yampi, bhante, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati;
an8.19:3.3_1: mahāsamudde dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:4.3_2: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṁ—
an8.19:5.2_1: tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
an8.19:5.3_3: tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
an8.19:5.4_2: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:6.1_1: yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti,
an8.19:6.1_2: na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati.
an8.19:6.2_1: yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti,
an8.19:6.2_2: na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
an8.19:6.3_2: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, mahāsamuddo ekaraso loṇaraso.
an8.19:7.3_2: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:8.1_3: seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitako masāragallaṁ.
an8.19:8.2_3: seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitako masāragallaṁ;
an8.19:8.3_2: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:9.1_2: Tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo timirapiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā.
an8.19:9.2_2: tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo timirapiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā;
an8.19:9.3_2: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.19:9.4_2: ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantīti.
an8.19:10.1_0: Api pana, bhante, bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramantī”ti?
an8.19:10.3_2: ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramantī”ti?
an8.19:10.4_2: ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:10.9_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:10.9_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:11.1_0: Seyyathāpi, pahārāda, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati;
an8.19:11.2_1: yaṁ mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti.
an8.19:11.3_0: Yampi, pahārāda, mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti;
an8.19:11.4_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:11.4_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:12.1_3: taṁ khippameva tīraṁ vāheti thalaṁ ussāreti;
an8.19:13.1_1: yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī
an8.19:13.1_5: Kiñcāpi so hoti majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa sannisinno,
an8.19:13.1_6: atha kho so ārakāva saṅghamhā saṅgho ca tena.
an8.19:13.2_1: yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī
an8.19:13.2_5: kiñcāpi so hoti majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa sannisinno,
an8.19:13.2_6: atha kho so ārakāva saṅghamhā saṅgho ca tena;
an8.19:13.3_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:13.3_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:14.1_3: tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
an8.19:14.2_2: te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
an8.19:14.3_2: te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni,
an8.19:14.4_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:14.4_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:15.1_1: yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti,
an8.19:15.1_2: na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
an8.19:15.2_1: bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti,
an8.19:15.2_2: na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati.
an8.19:15.3_1: bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti,
an8.19:15.3_2: na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
an8.19:15.4_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:15.4_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:16.2_0: evamevaṁ kho, pahārāda, ayaṁ dhammavinayo ekaraso, vimuttiraso.
an8.19:16.3_0: Yampi, pahārāda, ayaṁ dhammavinayo ekaraso, vimuttiraso;
an8.19:16.4_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:16.4_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:17.1_3: seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitako masāragallaṁ;
an8.19:17.4_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:17.4_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.19:18.1_2: tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo timirapiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā;
an8.19:18.4_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
an8.19:18.4_2: yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

an8.20:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
an8.20:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an8.20:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā,
an8.20:1.3_2: uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.20:1.4_0: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho.
an8.20:2.2_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā,
an8.20:2.2_2: uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.20:2.3_0: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto majjhimo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho.
an8.20:2.6_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā,
an8.20:2.6_3: nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.20:2.7_0: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yāmo, uddhastaṁ aruṇaṁ, nandimukhī ratti;
an8.20:3.2_0: “kaṁ nu kho bhagavā puggalaṁ sandhāya evamāha:
an8.20:3.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sabbāvantaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ cetasā ceto paricca manasākāsi.
an8.20:3.5_0: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ dussīlaṁ pāpadhammaṁ asuciṁ saṅkassarasamācāraṁ paṭicchannakammantaṁ
an8.20:3.5_1: assamaṇaṁ samaṇapaṭiññaṁ abrahmacāriṁ brahmacāripaṭiññaṁ antopūtiṁ avassutaṁ kasambujātaṁ majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnaṁ;
an8.20:3.6_0: disvāna uṭṭhāyāsanā yena so puggalo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ puggalaṁ etadavoca:
an8.20:4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
an8.20:4.2_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ etadavoca:
an8.20:4.5_0: Dutiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
an8.20:4.6_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ etadavoca:
an8.20:4.9_0: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
an8.20:5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā bahidvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvā sūcighaṭikaṁ datvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.20:5.6_0: Yāva bāhā gahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamissatī”ti.
an8.20:6.2_0: “tumheva dāni, bhikkhave, uposathaṁ kareyyātha, pātimokkhaṁ uddiseyyātha.
an8.20:6.3_0: Na dānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ajjatagge uposathaṁ karissāmi, pātimokkhaṁ uddisissāmi.
an8.20:6.4_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhaṁ uddiseyya.
an8.20:7.1_3: ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
an8.20:7.3_0: Mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto.
an8.20:7.4_0: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto;
an8.20:7.5_3: yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti (yathā purime tathā vitthāro.)
an8.20:8.1_3: Tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo timirapiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā.

an8.21:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an8.21:1.3_2: acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṁ uggaṁ gahapatiṁ vesālikaṁ dhārethā”ti.
an8.21:1.5_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
an8.21:2.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena uggassa gahapatino vesālikassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an8.21:2.2_0: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesāliko yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
an8.21:2.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.21:2.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho uggaṁ gahapatiṁ vesālikaṁ so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.21:3.1_0: “Aṭṭhahi kho tvaṁ, gahapati, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.21:3.2_0: Katame te, gahapati, aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, yehi tvaṁ samannāgato bhagavatā byākato”ti?
an8.21:3.4_0: ‘katamehi aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’ti.
an8.21:3.5_0: Api ca, bhante, ye me aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā saṁvijjanti,;
an8.21:3.6_0: taṁ suṇohi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.21:3.7_0: “Evaṁ, gahapatī”ti kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino vesālikassa paccassosi.
an8.21:3.10_0: saha dassaneneva me, bhante, bhagavato cittaṁ pasīdi.
an8.21:3.11_0: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.21:4.1_0: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, pasannacitto bhagavantaṁ payirupāsiṁ.
an8.21:4.2_0: Tassa me bhagavā anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
an8.21:4.3_0: dānakathaṁ sīlakathaṁ saggakathaṁ; kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṅkilesaṁ, nekkhamme ānisaṁsaṁ pakāsesi.
an8.21:4.4_0: Yadā maṁ bhagavā aññāsi kallacittaṁ muducittaṁ vinīvaraṇacittaṁ udaggacittaṁ pasannacittaṁ,
an8.21:4.4_1: atha yā buddhānaṁ sāmukkaṁsikā dhammadesanā taṁ pakāsesi—
an8.21:4.6_0: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṁ vatthaṁ apagatakāḷakaṁ sammadeva rajanaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya;
an8.21:4.7_0: evamevaṁ kho me tasmiṁyeva āsane virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi:
an8.21:4.9_1: diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane
an8.21:4.10_0: tattheva buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṁ agamāsiṁ,
an8.21:4.11_0: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.21:5.1_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, catasso komāriyo pajāpatiyo ahesuṁ.
an8.21:5.2_0: Atha khvāhaṁ, bhante, yena tā pajāpatiyo tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā tā pajāpatiyo etadavacaṁ:
an8.21:5.4_0: Yā icchati sā idheva bhoge ca bhuñjatu puññāni ca karotu, sakāni vā ñātikulāni gacchatu.
an8.21:5.5_0: Hoti vā pana purisādhippāyo, kassa vo dammī’ti?
an8.21:5.6_0: Evaṁ vutte, sā, bhante, jeṭṭhā pajāpati maṁ etadavoca:
an8.21:5.8_1: taṁ purisaṁ pakkosāpetvā vāmena hatthena pajāpatiṁ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena bhiṅgāraṁ gahetvā tassa purisassa oṇojesiṁ.
an8.21:5.9_0: Komāriṁ kho panāhaṁ, bhante, dāraṁ pariccajanto nābhijānāmi cittassa aññathattaṁ.
an8.21:5.10_0: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.21:6.1_0: Saṁvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhogā.
an8.21:6.2_0: Te ca kho appaṭivibhattā sīlavantehi kalyāṇadhammehi.
an8.21:6.3_0: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.21:7.1_0: Yaṁ kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhikkhuṁ payirupāsāmi;
an8.21:7.3_0: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.21:8.1_0: So ce, bhante, me āyasmā dhammaṁ deseti;
an8.21:8.3_0: No ce me so āyasmā dhammaṁ deseti, ahamassa dhammaṁ desemi.
an8.21:8.4_0: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.21:9.1_0: Anacchariyaṁ kho pana maṁ, bhante, devatā upasaṅkamitvā ārocenti:
an8.21:9.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, tā devatā evaṁ vadāmi:
an8.21:9.4_0: ‘vadeyyātha vā evaṁ kho tumhe devatā no vā vadeyyātha, atha kho svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo’ti.
an8.21:9.5_0: Na kho panāhaṁ, bhante, abhijānāmi tatonidānaṁ cittassa unnatiṁ:
an8.21:9.6_0: ‘maṁ vā devatā upasaṅkamanti, ahaṁ vā devatāhi saddhiṁ sallapāmī’ti.
an8.21:9.7_0: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.21:10.1_2: nāhaṁ tesaṁ kiñci attani appahīnaṁ samanupassāmi.

an8.23:2.2_0: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
an8.23:2.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.23:2.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.23:3.1_0: “Sattahi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.23:3.10_0: Imehi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato”ti.
an8.23:3.11_0: “Kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti?
an8.23:3.12_0: “Na hettha, āvuso, koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti.
an8.23:3.13_0: “Sādhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti.
an8.23:4.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesane piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an8.23:4.2_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.23:4.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.23:5.1_1: pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ;
an8.23:5.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ etadavacaṁ:
an8.23:5.4_0: ‘sattahi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.23:5.13_0: Imehi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’ti.
an8.23:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, hatthako maṁ etadavoca:
an8.23:6.2_0: ‘kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’ti?
an8.23:6.3_0: ‘Na hettha, āvuso, koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’ti.
an8.23:6.4_0: ‘Sādhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’”ti.
an8.23:7.3_0: Santeyeva attani kusaladhamme na icchati parehi ñāyamāne.
an8.23:7.4_1: imināpi aṭṭhamena acchariyena abbhutena dhammena samannāgataṁ hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ dhārehi,
an8.24:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
an8.24:1.2_0: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako pañcamattehi upāsakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.24:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an8.24:1.4_0: Kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, hatthaka, imaṁ mahatiṁ parisaṁ saṅgaṇhāsī”ti?
an8.24:1.14_0: Saṁvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhogā.
an8.24:1.15_0: Daliddassa kho no tathā sotabbaṁ maññantī”ti.
an8.24:1.17_0: Yoni kho tyāyaṁ, hatthaka, mahatiṁ parisaṁ saṅgahetuṁ.
an8.24:1.18_2: sabbe te imeheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahatiṁ parisaṁ saṅgahesuṁ.
an8.24:1.19_2: sabbe te imeheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahatiṁ parisaṁ saṅgaṇhissanti.
an8.24:1.20_2: sabbe te imeheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahatiṁ parisaṁ saṅgaṇhantī”ti.
an8.24:2.1_0: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā
an8.24:2.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkante hatthake āḷavake bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.24:2.3_0: “aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṁ hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ dhāretha.
an8.24:2.13_2: aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṁ hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ dhārethā”ti.
an8.25:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
an8.25:1.2_0: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.25:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.25:2.3_0: ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
an8.25:3.1_0: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti?
an8.25:3.2_0: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako attanāva saddhāsampanno hoti, no paraṁ saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:3.3_0: attanāva sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:3.4_0: attanāva cāgasampanno hoti, no paraṁ cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:3.5_0: attanāva bhikkhūnaṁ dassanakāmo hoti, no paraṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dassane samādapeti;
an8.25:3.6_0: attanāva saddhammaṁ sotukāmo hoti, no paraṁ saddhammassavane samādapeti;
an8.25:3.7_0: attanāva sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, no paraṁ dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
an8.25:3.8_0: attanāva sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, no paraṁ atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti;
an8.25:3.10_0: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti.
an8.25:4.1_0: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti?
an8.25:4.2_0: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako attanā ca saddhāsampanno hoti, parañca saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:4.3_0: attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, parañca sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:4.4_0: attanā ca cāgasampanno hoti, parañca cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:4.5_0: attanā ca bhikkhūnaṁ dassanakāmo hoti, parañca bhikkhūnaṁ dassane samādapeti;
an8.25:4.6_0: attanā ca saddhammaṁ sotukāmo hoti, parañca saddhammassavane samādapeti;
an8.25:4.7_0: attanā ca sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, parañca dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
an8.25:4.8_0: attanā ca sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, parañca atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti,
an8.25:4.9_0: attanā ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti,
an8.25:4.10_0: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti.
an8.26:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati jīvakambavane.
an8.26:1.2_0: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.26:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.26:1.4_0: “Yato kho, jīvaka, buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti;
an8.26:2.3_0: ettāvatā kho, jīvaka, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
an8.26:3.1_0: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti?
an8.26:3.2_0: “Yato kho, jīvaka, upāsako attanāva saddhāsampanno hoti, no paraṁ saddhāsampadāya samādapeti …pe…
an8.26:3.4_0: Ettāvatā kho, jīvaka, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti.
an8.26:4.1_0: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti?
an8.26:4.2_0: “Yato kho, jīvaka, upāsako attanā ca saddhāsampanno hoti, parañca saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.3_0: attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, parañca sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.4_0: attanā ca cāgasampanno hoti, parañca cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.5_0: attanā ca bhikkhūnaṁ dassanakāmo hoti, parañca bhikkhūnaṁ dassane samādapeti;
an8.26:4.6_0: attanā ca saddhammaṁ sotukāmo hoti, parañca saddhammassavane samādapeti;
an8.26:4.7_0: attanā ca sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, parañca dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.8_0: attanā ca sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, parañca atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti;
an8.26:4.9_0: attanā ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti,
an8.26:4.10_0: Ettāvatā kho, jīvaka, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti.
an8.28:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.28:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an8.28:1.2_3: yehi balehi samannāgato khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.28:1.4_2: yehi balehi samannāgato khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.28:2.2_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
an8.28:2.3_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi, bhante,
an8.28:2.3_3: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.28:3.1_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
an8.28:3.2_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi, bhante,
an8.28:3.2_3: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.28:4.1_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāraṁ vivekaṭṭhaṁ nekkhammābhirataṁ
an8.28:4.2_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāraṁ vivekaṭṭhaṁ nekkhammābhirataṁ
an8.28:4.2_2: byantibhūtaṁ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi, idampi, bhante,
an8.28:4.2_4: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.28:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā.
an8.28:5.2_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā, idampi, bhante,
an8.28:5.2_3: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.28:6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā …pe…
an8.28:6.4_0: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito.
an8.28:6.5_1: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito, idampi, bhante,
an8.28:6.5_3: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.28:7.1_2: yehi balehi samannāgato khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ paṭijānāti:
an8.29:1.1_4: no ca kho so jānāti khaṇaṁ vā akkhaṇaṁ vā.
an8.29:1.4_2: tathāgato ca loke uppanno hoti arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
an8.29:1.4_4: dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito;
an8.29:1.6_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo akkhaṇo asamayo brahmacariyavāsāya.
an8.29:2.1_4: dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito;
an8.29:4.2_0: ayañca puggalo aññataraṁ dīghāyukaṁ devanikāyaṁ upapanno hoti …pe….
an8.29:5.2_0: ayañca puggalo paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti,
an8.29:5.2_2: yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānaṁ …pe….
an8.29:6.1_2: ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti,
an8.29:6.2_9: natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammā paṭipannā ye imañca lokaṁ parañca lokaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti …pe….
an8.29:7.2_0: ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti,
an8.29:7.2_1: so ca hoti duppañño jaḷo eḷamūgo appaṭibalo subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
an8.29:7.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sattamo akkhaṇo asamayo brahmacariyavāsāya.
an8.29:8.1_2: tathāgato ca loke anuppanno hoti arahaṁ sammāsambuddho …pe…
an8.29:8.2_0: Dhammo ca na desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito.
an8.29:8.2_1: Ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti,
an8.29:8.2_2: so ca hoti paññavā ajaḷo aneḷamūgo paṭibalo subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
an8.29:8.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, aṭṭhamo akkhaṇo asamayo brahmacariyavāsāya.
an8.29:9.1_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha akkhaṇā asamayā brahmacariyavāsāya.
an8.29:10.1_0: Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāya.
an8.29:10.3_2: tathāgato ca loke uppanno hoti arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
an8.29:10.4_0: Dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito.
an8.29:10.4_1: Ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti,
an8.29:10.4_2: so ca hoti paññavā ajaḷo aneḷamūgo paṭibalo subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
an8.29:10.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, ekova khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyāti.
an8.30:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati suṁsumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
an8.30:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho cetīsu viharati pācīnavaṁsadāye.
an8.30:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmato anuruddhassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an8.30:1.10_0: paññavato ayaṁ dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo duppaññassā”ti.
an8.30:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato anuruddhassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
an8.30:2.1_2: evamevaṁ—bhaggesu susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye antarahito cetīsu pācīnavaṁsadāye āyasmato anuruddhassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
an8.30:2.3_0: Āyasmāpi kho anuruddho bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.30:2.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an8.30:3.2_0: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, anuruddha, yaṁ taṁ mahāpurisavitakkaṁ vitakkesi:
an8.30:3.9_0: paññavato ayaṁ dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo duppaññassā’ti.
an8.30:3.10_0: Tena hi tvaṁ, anuruddha, imampi aṭṭhamaṁ mahāpurisavitakkaṁ vitakkehi:
an8.30:3.11_0: ‘nippapañcārāmassāyaṁ dhammo nippapañcaratino, nāyaṁ dhammo papañcārāmassa papañcaratino’ti.
an8.30:4.1_6: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharissasi.
an8.30:5.1_6: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharissasi.
an8.30:6.1_6: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharissasi sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedissasi yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
an8.30:6.1_7: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharissasi.
an8.30:7.1_6: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ
an8.30:8.1_3: imesañca catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī bhavissasi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.30:8.1_6: seyyathāpi nāma gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā nānārattānaṁ dussānaṁ dussakaraṇḍako pūro;
an8.30:8.2_0: evamevaṁ te paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ khāyissati santuṭṭhassa viharato ratiyā aparitassāya phāsuvihārāya okkamanāya nibbānassa.
an8.30:9.1_3: imesañca catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī bhavissasi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.30:9.1_6: seyyathāpi nāma gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā sālīnaṁ odano vicitakāḷako anekasūpo anekabyañjano;
an8.30:9.2_0: evamevaṁ te piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṁ khāyissati santuṭṭhassa viharato ratiyā aparitassāya phāsuvihārāya okkamanāya nibbānassa.
an8.30:10.1_3: imesañca catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī bhavissasi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.30:10.1_6: seyyathāpi nāma gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā kūṭāgāraṁ ullittāvalittaṁ nivātaṁ phusitaggaḷaṁ pihitavātapānaṁ;
an8.30:10.2_0: evamevaṁ te rukkhamūlasenāsanaṁ khāyissati santuṭṭhassa viharato ratiyā aparitassāya phāsuvihārāya okkamanāya nibbānassa.
an8.30:11.1_3: imesañca catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī bhavissasi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.30:11.1_6: seyyathāpi nāma gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā pallaṅko gonakatthato paṭikatthato paṭalikatthato

an8.30:12.1_3: imesañca catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī bhavissasi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,

an8.30:12.3_0: Tena hi tvaṁ, anuruddha, āyatikampi vassāvāsaṁ idheva cetīsu pācīnavaṁsadāye vihareyyāsī”ti.
an8.30:12.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavato paccassosi.
an8.30:13.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
an8.30:13.1_2: evamevaṁ—cetīsu pācīnavaṁsadāye antarahito bhaggesu susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye pāturahosīti.
an8.30:13.4_0: “aṭṭha kho, bhikkhave, mahāpurisavitakke desessāmi, taṁ suṇātha …pe…
an8.30:13.6_0: Appicchassāyaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo mahicchassa;
an8.30:13.7_0: santuṭṭhassāyaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo asantuṭṭhassa;
an8.30:13.8_0: pavivittassāyaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo saṅgaṇikārāmassa;
an8.30:13.9_0: āraddhavīriyassāyaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo kusītassa;
an8.30:13.10_0: upaṭṭhitassatissāyaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo muṭṭhassatissa;
an8.30:13.11_0: samāhitassāyaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo asamāhitassa;
an8.30:13.12_0: paññavato ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṁ dhammo duppaññassa;
an8.30:13.13_0: nippapañcārāmassāyaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo nippapañcaratino, nāyaṁ dhammo papañcārāmassa papañcaratino.

an8.30:22.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho āyatikampi vassāvāsaṁ tattheva cetīsu pācīnavaṁsadāye vihāsi.
an8.30:22.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
an8.30:22.2_2: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an8.30:22.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an8.30:22.4_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā anuruddho arahataṁ ahosīti.
an8.30:22.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho arahattappatto tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
an8.31:1.8_0: ‘ahaṁ pacāmi, ime na pacanti; nārahāmi pacanto apacantānaṁ dānaṁ adātun’ti dānaṁ deti,

an8.35:1.3_2: ekacco dānaṁ deti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
an8.35:1.5_0: So passati khattiyamahāsāle vā brāhmaṇamahāsāle vā gahapatimahāsāle vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappite samaṅgībhūte paricārayamāne.
an8.35:1.7_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṁ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṁ vā sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
an8.35:1.8_0: So taṁ cittaṁ dahati, taṁ cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti, taṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
an8.35:1.9_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ hīne vimuttaṁ, uttari abhāvitaṁ, tatrūpapattiyā saṁvattati.

an8.38:1.1_0: “Sappuriso, bhikkhave, kule jāyamāno bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya hoti—

an8.39:1.1_2: puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā sovaggikā sukhavipākā saggasaṁvattanikā,
an8.39:1.1_3: iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattanti.
an8.39:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti.

an8.39:3.2_2: tatiyo puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṁvattaniko,

an8.45:6.8_0: Tena saṁvaccharena dibbāni soḷasa vassasahassāni paranimmitavasavattīnaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an8.45:6.9_1: vijjati yaṁ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ uposathaṁ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
an8.45:6.10_0: Idaṁ kho panetaṁ, bojjhe, sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
an8.45:7.2_0: Musā na bhāse na ca majjapo siyā;
an8.45:8.1_0: Mālaṁ na dhāre na ca gandhamācare,
an8.45:9.1_0: Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassanā,
an8.45:12.1_0: Tasmā hi nārī ca naro ca sīlavā,
an8.46:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an8.46:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho divāvihāraṁ gato hoti paṭisallīno.
an8.46:1.3_0: Atha kho sambahulā manāpakāyikā devatā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an8.46:1.3_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu.
an8.46:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho tā devatā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an8.46:1.4_0: “mayaṁ, bhante anuruddha, manāpakāyikā nāma devatā tīsu ṭhānesu issariyaṁ kārema vasaṁ vattema.
an8.46:1.5_0: Mayaṁ, bhante anuruddha, yādisakaṁ vaṇṇaṁ ākaṅkhāma tādisakaṁ vaṇṇaṁ ṭhānaso paṭilabhāma;
an8.46:1.6_0: yādisakaṁ saraṁ ākaṅkhāma tādisakaṁ saraṁ ṭhānaso paṭilabhāma;
an8.46:1.7_0: yādisakaṁ sukhaṁ ākaṅkhāma tādisakaṁ sukhaṁ ṭhānaso paṭilabhāma.
an8.46:1.8_2: manāpakāyikā nāma devatā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu issariyaṁ kārema vasaṁ vattemā”ti.
an8.46:2.2_0: “aho vatimā devatā sabbāva nīlā assu nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā”ti.
an8.46:2.3_0: Atha kho tā devatā āyasmato anuruddhassa cittamaññāya sabbāva nīlā ahesuṁ nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā.
an8.46:3.4_0: sabbāva odātā assu odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā”ti.
an8.46:3.5_0: Atha kho tā devatā āyasmato anuruddhassa cittamaññāya sabbāva odātā ahesuṁ odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā.
an8.46:4.1_0: Atha kho tā devatā ekā ca gāyi ekā ca nacci ekā ca accharaṁ vādesi.
an8.46:4.2_0: Seyyathāpi nāma pañcaṅgikassa tūriyassa suvinītassa suppaṭipatāḷitassa kusalehi susamannāhatassa saddo
an8.46:4.2_1: hoti vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca pemanīyo ca madanīyo ca;
an8.46:4.3_0: evamevaṁ tāsaṁ devatānaṁ alaṅkārānaṁ saddo hoti vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca pemanīyo ca madanīyo ca.
an8.46:4.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho indriyāni okkhipi.
an8.46:5.1_0: Atha kho tā devatā “na khvayyo anuruddho sādiyatī”ti tatthevantaradhāyiṁsu.
an8.46:5.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.46:5.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.46:6.3_0: ‘mayaṁ, bhante anuruddha, manāpakāyikā nāma devatā tīsu ṭhānesu issariyaṁ kārema vasaṁ vattema.
an8.46:6.4_0: Mayaṁ, bhante anuruddha, yādisakaṁ vaṇṇaṁ ākaṅkhāma tādisakaṁ vaṇṇaṁ ṭhānaso paṭilabhāma;
an8.46:6.5_0: yādisakaṁ saraṁ ākaṅkhāma tādisakaṁ saraṁ ṭhānaso paṭilabhāma;
an8.46:6.6_0: yādisakaṁ sukhaṁ ākaṅkhāma tādisakaṁ sukhaṁ ṭhānaso paṭilabhāma.
an8.46:6.7_2: manāpakāyikā nāma devatā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu issariyaṁ kārema vasaṁ vattemā’ti.
an8.46:6.9_0: ‘aho vatimā devatā sabbāva nīlā assu nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā’ti.
an8.46:6.10_0: Atha kho, bhante, tā devatā mama cittamaññāya sabbāva nīlā ahesuṁ nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā.
an8.46:7.4_0: sabbāva odātā assu odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā’ti.
an8.46:7.5_1: tā devatā mama cittamaññāya sabbāva odātā ahesuṁ odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā.
an8.46:8.1_0: Atha kho, bhante, tā devatā ekā ca gāyi ekā ca nacci ekā ca accharaṁ vādesi.
an8.46:8.2_0: Seyyathāpi nāma pañcaṅgikassa tūriyassa suvinītassa suppaṭipatāḷitassa kusalehi susamannāhatassa saddo
an8.46:8.2_1: hoti vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca pemanīyo ca madanīyo ca;
an8.46:8.3_0: evamevaṁ tāsaṁ devatānaṁ alaṅkārānaṁ saddo hoti vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca pemanīyo ca madanīyo ca.
an8.46:9.1_0: Atha kho, bhante, tā devatā ‘na khvayyo anuruddho sādiyatī’ti tatthevantaradhāyiṁsu.
an8.46:9.2_1: dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā manāpakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti?
an8.46:10.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā manāpakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an8.46:10.3_2: mātugāmo yassa mātāpitaro bhattuno denti atthakāmā hitesino anukampakā anukampaṁ upādāya tassa hoti pubbuṭṭhāyinī
an8.46:11.2_0: mātāti vā pitāti vā samaṇabrāhmaṇāti vā—
an8.46:11.3_0: te sakkaroti, garuṁ karoti, māneti, pūjeti, abbhāgate ca āsanodakena paṭipūjeti.
an8.46:12.1_0: Ye te bhattu abbhantarā kammantā—uṇṇāti vā kappāsāti vā—tattha dakkhā hoti analasā tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgatā alaṁ kātuṁ alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ.
an8.46:13.1_0: Yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano—dāsāti vā pessāti vā kammakarāti vā—
an8.46:13.2_0: tesaṁ katañca katato jānāti akatañca akatato jānāti,
an8.46:13.2_1: gilānakānañca balābalaṁ jānāti khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyañcassa paccaṁsena saṁvibhajati.
an8.46:14.1_0: Yaṁ bhattu āharati dhanaṁ vā dhaññaṁ vā jātarūpaṁ vā taṁ ārakkhena guttiyā sampādeti,
an8.46:14.1_1: tattha ca hoti adhuttī athenī asoṇḍī avināsikā.
an8.46:15.1_0: Upāsikā kho pana hoti buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatā dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gatā saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gatā.
an8.46:17.2_0: Vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgā payatapāṇinī vossaggaratā yācayogā dānasaṁvibhāgaratā.
an8.46:18.1_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā manāpakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatīti.
an8.47:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.

an8.49:1.2_0: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe….
an8.49:1.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho visākhaṁ migāramātaraṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an8.49:2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti,
an8.49:3.2_1: mātugāmo ye te bhattu abbhantarā kammantā—uṇṇāti vā kappāsāti vā—tattha dakkhā hoti analasā tatrupāyāya
an8.49:3.2_2: vīmaṁsāya samannāgatā alaṁ kātuṁ alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ.
an8.49:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, visākhe, mātugāmo susaṁvihitakammanto hoti.
an8.49:4.2_0: Idha, visākhe, mātugāmo yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano—dāsāti vā pessāti vā kammakarāti vā—
an8.49:4.3_0: tesaṁ katañca katato jānāti akatañca akatato jānāti,
an8.49:4.3_1: gilānakānañca balābalaṁ jānāti khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyañcassa paccaṁsena saṁvibhajati.
an8.49:4.4_0: Evaṁ kho, visākhe, mātugāmo saṅgahitaparijano hoti.
an8.49:5.1_0: Kathañca, visākhe, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṁ carati?
an8.49:5.2_0: Idha, visākhe, mātugāmo yaṁ bhattu amanāpasaṅkhātaṁ taṁ jīvitahetupi na ajjhācarati.
an8.49:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, visākhe, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṁ carati.

an8.49:8.2_0: Idha, visākhe, mātugāmo saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an8.49:8.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an8.49:8.4_0: Evaṁ kho, visākhe, mātugāmo saddhāsampanno hoti.
an8.49:9.2_0: Idha, visākhe, mātugāmo pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
an8.49:9.3_0: Evaṁ kho, visākhe, mātugāmo sīlasampanno hoti.
