an8.51:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
an8.51:1.2_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.51:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.51:1.3_0: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:1.5_0: Mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjā”ti.
an8.51:2.1_0: Dutiyampi kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.51:2.2_0: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:2.4_0: Mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjā”ti.
an8.51:3.1_0: Tatiyampi kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.51:3.2_0: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:3.4_0: Mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjā”ti.
an8.51:4.1_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī “na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā
an8.51:4.1_1: anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an8.51:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
an8.51:5.2_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
an8.51:5.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an8.51:5.4_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī kese chedāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhiṁ yena vesālī tena pakkāmi.
an8.51:5.5_0: Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā tenupasaṅkami.
an8.51:5.6_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi.
an8.51:6.1_0: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhiṁ dummanaṁ assumukhiṁ rudamānaṁ bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitaṁ.
an8.51:6.3_1: sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā”ti?
an8.51:6.4_2: na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:6.5_2: yāvāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ yācāmi mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:7.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.51:7.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.51:7.2_1: mahāpajāpatī gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā:
an8.51:7.3_0: ‘na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan’ti.
an8.51:7.4_0: Sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:7.6_0: Mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjā”ti.
an8.51:8.2_0: tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.51:8.3_0: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:8.5_0: Mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjā”ti.
an8.51:9.2_0: “na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ.
an8.51:9.3_0: Yannūnāhaṁ aññenapi pariyāyena bhagavantaṁ yāceyyaṁ mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:9.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.51:9.5_1: mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ
an8.51:9.5_2: vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaphalaṁ vā sacchikātun”ti?
an8.51:9.6_1: mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalampi sakadāgāmiphalampi
an8.51:9.7_1: bhabbo mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalampi …pe…
an8.51:9.8_0: bahukārā, bhante, mahāpajāpatī gotamī bhagavato mātucchā āpādikā posikā khīrassa dāyikā;
an8.51:9.10_0: Sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjan”ti.
an8.51:10.1_0: “Sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpatī gotamī aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāvassā hotu upasampadā—
an8.51:11.1_0: Vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahūpasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ paccuṭṭhānaṁ añjalikammaṁ sāmīcikammaṁ kattabbaṁ.
an8.51:11.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:12.1_0: Na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṁ upagantabbaṁ.
an8.51:12.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:13.1_0: Anvaḍḍhamāsaṁ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā—
an8.51:13.3_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:14.1_0: Vassaṁvuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṁ—
an8.51:14.2_0: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
an8.51:14.3_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:15.1_0: Garudhammaṁ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṁ caritabbaṁ.
an8.51:15.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:16.1_0: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā pariyesitabbā.
an8.51:16.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:17.1_0: Na kenaci pariyāyena bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo.
an8.51:17.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:18.1_0: Ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṁ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho.
an8.51:18.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:19.1_0: Sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpatī gotamī ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāvassā hotu upasampadā”ti.
an8.51:20.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato santike ime aṭṭha garudhamme uggahetvā yena mahāpajāpatī gotamī tenupasaṅkami;
an8.51:21.1_0: “Sace kho tvaṁ, gotami, aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇheyyāsi, sāva te bhavissati upasampadā—
an8.51:22.1_0: Vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahūpasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ paccuṭṭhānaṁ añjalikammaṁ sāmīcikammaṁ kattabbaṁ.
an8.51:22.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo …pe….
an8.51:23.1_0: Ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṁ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho.
an8.51:23.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyo.
an8.51:23.3_0: Sace kho tvaṁ, gotami, ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇheyyāsi, sāva te bhavissati upasampadā”ti.
an8.51:24.1_2: itthī vā puriso vā daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko sīsaṁnhāto uppalamālaṁ vā vassikamālaṁ vā adhimuttakamālaṁ
an8.51:24.1_3: vā labhitvā ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahetvā uttamaṅge sirasmiṁ patiṭṭhāpeyya;
an8.51:24.2_0: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante ānanda, ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāmi yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīye”ti.
an8.51:25.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.51:25.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.51:25.2_0: “paṭiggahitā, bhante, mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭha garudhammā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyā”ti.
an8.51:26.1_1: nālabhissa mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ,
an8.51:26.2_1: mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito, na dāni, ānanda,
an8.51:26.3_0: Pañceva dāni, ānanda, vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassati.
an8.51:27.2_1: yasmiṁ dhammavinaye labhati mātugāmo agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ,
an8.51:28.1_1: sampanne sālikkhette setaṭṭhikā nāma rogajāti nipatati,
an8.51:28.1_2: evaṁ taṁ sālikkhettaṁ na ciraṭṭhitikaṁ hoti;
an8.51:28.2_1: yasmiṁ dhammavinaye labhati mātugāmo agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ,
an8.51:29.1_1: sampanne ucchukkhette mañjiṭṭhikā nāma rogajāti nipatati,
an8.51:29.1_2: evaṁ taṁ ucchukkhettaṁ na ciraṭṭhitikaṁ hoti;
an8.51:29.2_1: yasmiṁ dhammavinaye labhati mātugāmo agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ,
an8.51:30.1_1: puriso mahato taḷākassa paṭikacceva āḷiṁ bandheyya yāvadeva udakassa anatikkamanāya;
an8.51:30.2_1: mayā paṭikacceva bhikkhunīnaṁ aṭṭha garudhammā paññattā yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyā”ti.
an8.52:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an8.52:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.52:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.52:1.3_0: “katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammannitabbo”ti?
an8.52:2.1_0: “Aṭṭhahi kho, ānanda, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammannitabbo.
an8.52:2.3_0: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an8.52:2.5_0: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso;
an8.52:2.6_1: poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.52:2.7_0: paṭibalo hoti bhikkhunisaṅghassa dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ;
an8.52:2.9_0: na kho panetaṁ bhagavantaṁ uddissa pabbajitāya kāsāyavatthavasanāya garudhammaṁ ajjhāpannapubbo hoti;
an8.52:2.11_0: Imehi kho, ānanda, aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammannitabbo”ti.
an8.53:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an8.53:1.2_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpatī gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.53:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā mahāpajāpatī gotamī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.53:2.1_2: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā ekā vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpinī pahitattā vihareyyan”ti.
an8.53:3.1_0: Ye ca kho tvaṁ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi:
an8.54:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā koliyesu viharati kakkarapattaṁ nāma koliyānaṁ nigamo.
an8.54:1.2_0: Atha kho dīghajāṇu koliyaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.54:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho dīghajāṇu koliyaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.54:1.4_1: bhagavā amhākaṁ tathā dhammaṁ desetu ye amhākaṁ assu dhammā diṭṭhadhammahitāya diṭṭhadhammasukhāya,
an8.54:2.1_0: “Cattārome, byagghapajja, dhammā kulaputtassa diṭṭhadhammahitāya saṁvattanti diṭṭhadhammasukhāya.
an8.54:2.5_0: Idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto yena kammaṭṭhānena jīvikaṁ kappeti—
an8.54:2.7_0: tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato, alaṁ kātuṁ alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ.
an8.54:3.4_0: ‘kinti me ime bhoge neva rājāno hareyyuṁ,
an8.54:4.2_2: kulaputto yasmiṁ gāme vā nigame vā paṭivasati,
an8.54:4.2_3: tattha ye te honti—gahapatī vā gahapatiputtā vā daharā vā vuddhasīlino,
an8.54:4.2_8: paññāsampannā—tehi saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati;
an8.54:5.2_6: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.54:5.3_2: tulādhāro vā tulādhārantevāsī vā tulaṁ paggahetvā jānāti:
an8.54:5.4_6: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.54:5.5_2: kulaputto appāyo samāno uḷāraṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti,
an8.54:5.6_2: kulaputto mahāyo samāno kasiraṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti,
an8.54:5.7_6: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.54:6.1_0: Evaṁ samuppannānaṁ, byagghapajja, bhogānaṁ cattāri apāyamukhāni honti—
an8.54:6.2_0: itthidhutto, surādhutto, akkhadhutto, pāpamitto pāpasahāyo pāpasampavaṅko.
an8.54:6.3_0: Seyyathāpi, byagghapajja, mahato taḷākassa cattāri ceva āyamukhāni, cattāri ca apāyamukhāni.
an8.54:6.4_0: Tassa puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni pidaheyya, yāni ca apāyamukhāni tāni vivareyya;
an8.54:6.5_0: devo ca na sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccheyya.
an8.54:6.6_0: Evañhi tassa, byagghapajja, mahato taḷākassa parihāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no vuddhi;
an8.54:6.7_0: evamevaṁ, byagghapajja, evaṁ samuppannānaṁ bhogānaṁ cattāri apāyamukhāni honti—
an8.54:6.8_0: itthidhutto, surādhutto, akkhadhutto, pāpamitto pāpasahāyo pāpasampavaṅko.
an8.54:7.1_0: Evaṁ samuppannānaṁ, byagghapajja, bhogānaṁ cattāri āyamukhāni honti—
an8.54:7.2_0: na itthidhutto, na surādhutto, na akkhadhutto, kalyāṇamitto kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
an8.54:7.3_0: Seyyathāpi, byagghapajja, mahato taḷākassa cattāri ceva āyamukhāni, cattāri ca apāyamukhāni.
an8.54:7.4_0: Tassa puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni vivareyya, yāni ca apāyamukhāni tāni pidaheyya;
an8.54:7.6_0: Evañhi tassa, byagghapajja, mahato taḷākassa vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni;
an8.54:7.7_0: evamevaṁ kho, byagghapajja, evaṁ samuppannānaṁ bhogānaṁ cattāri āyamukhāni honti—
an8.54:7.8_0: na itthidhutto, na surādhutto, na akkhadhutto, kalyāṇamitto kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
an8.54:8.1_2: cattāro dhammā kulaputtassa diṭṭhadhammahitāya saṁvattanti diṭṭhadhammasukhāya.
an8.54:9.1_0: Cattārome, byagghapajja, dhammā kulaputtassa samparāyahitāya saṁvattanti samparāyasukhāya.
an8.54:10.2_0: Idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an8.54:10.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an8.54:12.2_2: kulaputto vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgarato.
an8.54:13.2_3: udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an8.54:14.1_0: Ime kho, byagghapajja, cattāro dhammā kulaputtassa samparāyahitāya saṁvattanti samparāyasukhāyāti.
an8.55:1.1_0: Atha kho ujjayo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an8.55:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.55:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho ujjayo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.55:1.4_0: Tesaṁ no bhavaṁ gotamo amhākaṁ tathā dhammaṁ desetu—ye amhākaṁ assu dhammā diṭṭhadhammahitāya,
an8.55:2.1_0: “Cattārome, brāhmaṇa, dhammā kulaputtassa diṭṭhadhammahitāya saṁvattanti, diṭṭhadhammasukhāya.
an8.55:3.2_0: Idha, brāhmaṇa, kulaputto yena kammaṭṭhānena jīvikaṁ kappeti—
an8.55:3.4_0: tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato, alaṁ kātuṁ alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ.
an8.55:4.4_0: ‘kinti me ime bhoge neva rājāno hareyyuṁ,
an8.55:5.2_1: kulaputto yasmiṁ gāme vā nigame vā paṭivasati tatra ye te honti—gahapatī vā gahapatiputtā vā daharā vā vuddhasīlino,
an8.55:5.2_6: paññāsampannā—tehi saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati;
an8.55:6.2_1: kulaputto āyañca bhogānaṁ viditvā vayañca bhogānaṁ viditvā samaṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti nāccogāḷhaṁ nātihīnaṁ:
an8.55:6.2_3: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.55:6.3_1: tulādhāro vā tulādhārantevāsī vā tulaṁ paggahetvā jānāti:
an8.55:6.4_1: kulaputto āyañca bhogānaṁ viditvā vayañca bhogānaṁ viditvā samaṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti nāccogāḷhaṁ nātihīnaṁ:
an8.55:6.4_3: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.55:6.5_1: kulaputto appāyo samāno uḷāraṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti,
an8.55:6.6_1: kulaputto mahāyo samāno kasiraṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti,
an8.55:6.7_1: kulaputto āyañca bhogānaṁ viditvā vayañca bhogānaṁ viditvā samaṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti nāccogāḷhaṁ nātihīnaṁ:
an8.55:6.7_3: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti,
an8.55:7.1_0: Evaṁ samuppannānaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhogānaṁ cattāri apāyamukhāni honti—
an8.55:7.2_0: itthidhutto, surādhutto, akkhadhutto, pāpamitto pāpasahāyo pāpasampavaṅko.
an8.55:7.3_3: Tassa puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni pidaheyya,
an8.55:7.3_5: devo ca na sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccheyya.
an8.55:7.4_0: evamevaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, evaṁ samuppannānaṁ bhogānaṁ cattāri apāyamukhāni honti—
an8.55:7.5_0: itthidhutto, surādhutto, akkhadhutto, pāpamitto pāpasahāyo pāpasampavaṅko.
an8.55:8.1_0: Evaṁ samuppannānaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhogānaṁ cattāri āyamukhāni honti—
an8.55:8.2_0: na itthidhutto, na surādhutto, na akkhadhutto, kalyāṇamitto kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
an8.55:8.3_1: mahato taḷākassa cattāri ceva āyamukhāni cattāri ca apāyamukhāni.
an8.55:8.3_2: Tassa puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni vivareyya,
an8.55:8.4_0: evamevaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, evaṁ samuppannānaṁ bhogānaṁ cattāri āyamukhāni honti—
an8.55:9.1_0: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, cattāro dhammā kulaputtassa diṭṭhadhammahitāya saṁvattanti diṭṭhadhammasukhāya.
an8.55:10.1_0: Cattārome, brāhmaṇa, kulaputtassa dhammā samparāyahitāya saṁvattanti samparāyasukhāya.
an8.55:10.5_0: Idha, brāhmaṇa, kulaputto saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an8.55:10.6_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an8.55:12.2_1: kulaputto vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgarato.
an8.55:13.2_0: Idha, brāhmaṇa, kulaputto paññavā hoti …pe… sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an8.55:14.1_0: “Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, cattāro dhammā kulaputtassa samparāyahitāya saṁvattanti samparāyasukhāyāti.
an8.57:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an8.57:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an8.57:1.7_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an8.57:1.8_2: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati;
an8.57:1.9_0: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena …pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānāti;
an8.57:1.11_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an8.58:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an8.58:1.5_0: āraddhavīriyo viharati thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.58:1.7_0: aratiratisaho hoti, uppannaṁ aratiṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya viharati;
an8.58:1.8_0: bhayabheravasaho hoti, uppannaṁ bhayabheravaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya viharati;
an8.58:1.9_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an8.59:1.1_2: puggalā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa?
an8.59:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha puggalā āhuneyyā …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti.
an8.60:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, puggalā āhuneyyā …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an8.60:1.3_0: Sotāpanno, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno …pe… arahā, arahattāya paṭipanno.
an8.60:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha puggalā āhuneyyā …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti.

an8.61:9.1_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an8.62:1.1_0: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:1.7_1: poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:1.8_0: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an8.62:1.9_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:2.8_0: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an8.62:2.9_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:3.1_0: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:3.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:3.7_1: poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:3.8_0: no ca sandassako hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an8.62:3.9_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:4.1_0: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ nālaṁ attano.
an8.62:4.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:4.5_0: no ca dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:4.6_0: na ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.62:4.7_0: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo …pe… atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:4.9_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.

an8.63:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
an8.63:1.1_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.63:1.2_2: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
an8.63:1.4_0: Dhamme ca bhāsite mamaññeva anubandhitabbaṁ maññantī”ti.
an8.63:1.5_3: Appeva nāmāhaṁ bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājāneyyaṁ,
an8.63:1.5_4: appeva nāmāhaṁ bhagavato bhāsitassa dāyādo assan”ti.
an8.63:1.7_1: na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassantī’ti.
an8.63:2.1_2: na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, tato te, bhikkhu,
an8.63:2.2_0: ‘mettā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
an8.63:3.1_1: ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato,
an8.63:4.1_0: Yato kho, te bhikkhu, ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti subhāvito, tato te, bhikkhu, evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ:
an8.63:4.4_0: upekkhā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
an8.63:5.1_1: ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti subhāvito,
an8.63:6.1_0: Yato kho te, bhikkhu, ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti subhāvito, tato te, bhikkhu, evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ:
an8.63:6.2_0: ‘kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassan’ti.
an8.63:7.1_1: ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato,
an8.63:8.1_0: Yato kho te, bhikkhu, ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti subhāvito, tato te, bhikkhu, evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ:
an8.63:8.4_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassan’ti.
an8.63:9.1_1: ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato,
an8.63:10.1_1: ayaṁ samādhi evaṁ bhāvito hoti subhāvito,
an8.63:10.1_6: yattha yattha seyyaṁ kappessasi phāsuṁyeva seyyaṁ kappessasī”ti.
an8.63:11.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavatā iminā ovādena ovadito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an8.63:11.2_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
an8.63:11.2_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an8.63:11.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an8.63:11.4_0: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
an8.64:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gayāyaṁ viharati gayāsīse.
an8.64:1.3_2: sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno obhāsaññeva kho sañjānāmi,
an8.64:2.2_0: ‘sace kho ahaṁ obhāsañceva sañjāneyyaṁ rūpāni ca passeyyaṁ;
an8.64:2.3_0: evaṁ me idaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ parisuddhataraṁ assā’ti.
an8.64:3.1_2: aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi,
an8.64:3.2_0: no ca kho tāhi devatāhi saddhiṁ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṁ samāpajjāmi.
an8.64:4.2_2: tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṁ santiṭṭheyyaṁ sallapeyyaṁ sākacchaṁ samāpajjeyyaṁ;
an8.64:4.3_0: evaṁ me idaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ parisuddhataraṁ assā’ti.
an8.64:5.1_2: aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi,
an8.64:5.1_4: tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṁ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṁ samāpajjāmi;
an8.64:5.2_0: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi—
an8.64:5.3_0: imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyāti.
an8.64:6.2_2: tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṁ santiṭṭheyyaṁ sallapeyyaṁ sākacchaṁ samāpajjeyyaṁ,
an8.64:6.3_0: “imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā”ti;
an8.64:6.4_0: evaṁ me idaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ parisuddhataraṁ assā’ti.
an8.64:7.1_2: aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi,
an8.64:7.1_4: tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṁ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṁ samāpajjāmi,
an8.64:7.2_0: ‘imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā’ti;
an8.64:7.3_0: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:7.4_0: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā’ti …pe…
an8.64:7.6_0: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā’ti;
an8.64:7.7_0: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:7.8_0: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena evamāhārā evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvediniyo’ti …pe…
an8.64:7.10_0: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena evamāhārā evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvediniyo’ti;
an8.64:7.11_0: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:7.15_0: no ca kho tā devatā jānāmi yadi vā me imāhi devatāhi saddhiṁ sannivutthapubbaṁ yadi vā na sannivutthapubbanti.
an8.64:8.2_2: tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṁ santiṭṭheyyaṁ sallapeyyaṁ sākacchaṁ samāpajjeyyaṁ,
an8.64:8.3_0: “imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā”ti, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṁ:
an8.64:8.4_0: “imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā”ti, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṁ:
an8.64:8.5_0: “imā devatā evamāhārā evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvediniyo”ti, tā ca devatā jāneyyaṁ:
an8.64:8.6_1: tā ca devatā jāneyyaṁ yadi vā me imāhi devatāhi saddhiṁ sannivutthapubbaṁ yadi vā na sannivutthapubbanti;
an8.64:8.7_0: evaṁ me idaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ parisuddhataraṁ assā’ti.
an8.64:9.1_2: aparena samayena appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi,
an8.64:9.1_4: tāhi ca devatāhi saddhiṁ santiṭṭhāmi sallapāmi sākacchaṁ samāpajjāmi,
an8.64:9.2_0: ‘imā devatā amukamhā vā amukamhā vā devanikāyā’ti, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:9.3_0: ‘imā devatā imassa kammassa vipākena ito cutā tattha upapannā’ti, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:9.4_0: ‘imā devatā evamāhārā evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvediniyo’ti, tā ca devatā jānāmi:
an8.64:9.5_1: tā ca devatā jānāmi yadi vā me devatāhi saddhiṁ sannivutthapubbaṁ yadi vā na sannivutthapubbanti.
an8.64:10.1_2: evaṁ aṭṭhaparivaṭṭaṁ adhidevañāṇadassanaṁ na suvisuddhaṁ ahosi,
an8.64:10.1_5: ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
an8.64:10.2_2: evaṁ aṭṭhaparivaṭṭaṁ adhidevañāṇadassanaṁ suvisuddhaṁ ahosi, athāhaṁ,
an8.64:10.2_4: ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ;
an8.64:10.4_0: akuppā me cetovimutti; ayamantimā jāti natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
an8.65:1.3_0: Ajjhattaṁ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an8.65:2.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an8.65:3.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an8.65:4.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
an8.65:5.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni.
an8.65:6.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni.
an8.65:7.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni lohitakanibhāsāni.
an8.65:8.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni.
an8.66:4.1_0: Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an8.66:5.1_0: Sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an8.66:6.1_0: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an8.66:7.1_0: Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an8.66:8.1_0: Sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an8.69:1.4_0: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, anekasataṁ khattiyaparisaṁ upasaṅkamitā.
an8.69:1.5_0: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:1.6_0: Tattha yādisako tesaṁ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṁ vaṇṇo hoti,
an8.69:1.6_1: yādisako tesaṁ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṁ saro hoti.
an8.69:1.7_0: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṁsemi.
an8.69:1.9_0: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:1.10_0: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:1.12_0: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:2.1_0: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, anekasataṁ brāhmaṇaparisaṁ …pe…
an8.69:2.8_0: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:2.9_0: Tattha yādisako tesaṁ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṁ vaṇṇo hoti,
an8.69:2.9_1: yādisako tesaṁ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṁ saro hoti.
an8.69:2.10_0: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṁsemi.
an8.69:2.12_0: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:2.13_0: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:2.15_0: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.70:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an8.70:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
an8.70:1.3_0: Vesāliyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an8.70:1.6_1: bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā nisīdanaṁ ādāya bhagavantaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
an8.70:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā yena cāpālaṁ cetiyaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an8.70:2.2_0: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an8.70:3.2_1: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā,
an8.70:3.3_1: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā.
an8.70:3.3_3: tathāgato kappaṁ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṁ vā”ti.
an8.70:3.4_0: Evampi kho āyasmā ānando bhagavatā oḷārike nimitte kayiramāne oḷārike obhāse kayiramāne nāsakkhi paṭivijjhituṁ;
an8.70:3.6_2: tiṭṭhatu sugato kappaṁ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti,
an8.70:4.2_0: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an8.70:4.4_1: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā,
an8.70:4.5_3: tathāgato kappaṁ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṁ vā”ti.
an8.70:4.6_0: Evampi kho āyasmā ānando bhagavatā oḷārike nimitte kayiramāne oḷārike obhāse kayiramāne nāsakkhi paṭivijjhituṁ;
an8.70:4.8_2: tiṭṭhatu sugato kappaṁ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti,
an8.70:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an8.70:5.3_1: bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā
an8.70:5.4_0: Atha kho māro pāpimā acirapakkante āyasmante ānande bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.70:6.1_0: “Parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato. Parinibbānakālo dāni, bhante, bhagavato.
an8.70:6.2_0: Bhāsitā kho panesā, bhante, bhagavatā vācā:
an8.70:6.3_1: parinibbāyissāmi yāva me bhikkhū na sāvakā bhavissanti viyattā vinītā visāradā pattayogakkhemā bahussutā
an8.70:6.3_3: sakaṁ ācariyakaṁ uggahetvā ācikkhissanti desessanti paññapessanti paṭṭhapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti
an8.70:6.3_4: uttānīkarissanti uppannaṁ parappavādaṁ sahadhammena suniggahitaṁ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desessantī’ti.
an8.70:6.4_1: bhikkhū bhagavato sāvakā viyattā vinītā visāradā pattayogakkhemā bahussutā dhammadharā dhammānudhammappaṭipannā sāmīcippaṭipannā anudhammacārino,
an8.70:6.4_2: sakaṁ ācariyakaṁ uggahetvā ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti
an8.70:6.4_3: uppannaṁ parappavādaṁ sahadhammena suniggahitaṁ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desenti.
an8.70:7.1_0: Parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato. Parinibbānakālo dāni, bhante, bhagavato.
an8.70:7.2_0: Bhāsitā kho panesā, bhante, bhagavatā vācā:
an8.70:7.3_0: ‘na tāvāhaṁ, pāpima, parinibbāyissāmi yāva me bhikkhuniyo na sāvikā bhavissanti …pe…
an8.70:7.4_0: yāva me upāsakā na sāvakā bhavissanti …pe…
an8.70:7.5_0: yāva me upāsikā na sāvikā bhavissanti viyattā vinītā visāradā pattayogakkhemā bahussutā dhammadharā dhammānudhammappaṭipannā
an8.70:7.5_2: sakaṁ ācariyakaṁ uggahetvā ācikkhissanti desessanti paññapessanti paṭṭhapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttānīkarissanti,
an8.70:7.5_3: uppannaṁ parappavādaṁ sahadhammena suniggahitaṁ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desessantī’ti.
an8.70:7.6_1: upāsikā bhagavato sāvikā viyattā vinītā visāradā pattayogakkhemā bahussutā dhammadharā dhammānudhammappaṭipannā sāmīcippaṭipannā anudhammacāriniyo,
an8.70:7.6_2: sakaṁ ācariyakaṁ uggahetvā ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti,
an8.70:7.6_3: uppannaṁ parappavādaṁ sahadhammena suniggahitaṁ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desenti.
an8.70:8.1_0: Parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato. Parinibbānakālo dāni, bhante, bhagavato.
an8.70:8.2_0: Bhāsitā kho panesā, bhante, bhagavatā vācā:
an8.70:8.3_1: parinibbāyissāmi yāva me idaṁ brahmacariyaṁ na iddhañceva bhavissati phītañca vitthārikaṁ bāhujaññaṁ puthubhūtaṁ,
an8.70:8.4_1: bhagavato brahmacariyaṁ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṁ bāhujaññaṁ puthubhūtaṁ,
an8.70:9.1_0: Parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato. Parinibbānakālo dāni, bhante, bhagavato”ti.
an8.70:9.2_0: “Appossukko tvaṁ, pāpima, hohi. Naciraṁ tathāgatassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
an8.70:9.3_0: Ito tiṇṇaṁ māsānaṁ accayena tathāgato parinibbāyissatī”ti.
an8.70:10.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā cāpāle cetiye sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṁ ossaji.
an8.70:10.2_0: Ossaṭṭhe ca bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāre mahābhūmicālo ahosi bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso,
an8.70:10.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
an8.70:12.3_0: sumahā vatāyaṁ bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso, devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu.
an8.70:12.4_0: Ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti?
an8.70:13.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.70:13.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.70:13.3_0: sumahā vatāyaṁ, bhante, bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso, devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu.
an8.70:13.4_0: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti?
an8.70:14.1_0: “Aṭṭhime, ānanda, hetū, aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:14.4_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, paṭhamo hetu, paṭhamo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:15.1_1: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto devatā vā mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā.
an8.70:15.1_4: So imaṁ pathaviṁ kampeti saṅkampeti sampakampeti sampavedheti.
an8.70:15.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, dutiyo hetu, dutiyo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:16.1_1: yadā bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā sato sampajāno mātukucchiṁ okkamati,
an8.70:16.1_2: tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
an8.70:16.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, tatiyo hetu, tatiyo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:17.1_1: yadā bodhisatto sato sampajāno mātukucchismā nikkhamati,
an8.70:17.1_2: tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
an8.70:17.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, catuttho hetu, catuttho paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:18.1_2: tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
an8.70:18.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, pañcamo hetu, pañcamo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:19.1_2: tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
an8.70:19.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, chaṭṭho hetu, chaṭṭho paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:20.1_1: yadā tathāgato sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṁ ossajjati,
an8.70:20.1_2: tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
an8.70:20.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, sattamo hetu, sattamo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:21.1_2: tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
an8.70:21.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, aṭṭhamo hetu, aṭṭhamo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
an8.70:21.3_0: Ime kho, ānanda, aṭṭha hetū, aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti.
an8.71:1.1_0: “Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca sīlavā.
an8.71:1.5_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti sīlavā ca,
an8.71:2.1_0: Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti sīlavā ca, no ca bahussuto.
an8.71:2.4_0: ‘kintāhaṁ saddho ca assaṁ, sīlavā ca, bahussuto cā’ti.
an8.71:2.5_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti sīlavā ca bahussuto ca,
an8.71:3.1_0: Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti sīlavā ca bahussuto ca, no ca dhammakathiko …pe…
an8.71:3.3_0: parisāvacaro ca, no ca visārado parisāya dhammaṁ deseti …pe…
an8.71:3.4_1: no ca catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī …pe…
an8.71:3.5_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.71:3.5_1: no ca āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati;
an8.71:3.8_6: catunnañca jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī assaṁ akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.71:3.8_7: āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an8.71:4.1_8: catunnañca jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.71:4.1_9: āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati;
an8.71:4.3_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samantapāsādiko ca hoti sabbākāraparipūro cā”ti.
an8.72:1.1_0: “Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca sīlavā.
an8.72:1.5_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti sīlavā ca,
an8.72:2.1_0: Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti sīlavā ca, no ca bahussuto …pe…
an8.72:2.4_0: parisāvacaro ca, no ca visārado parisāya dhammaṁ deseti …pe…
an8.72:2.5_1: no ca ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati …pe…
an8.72:2.6_0: ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā viharati,
an8.72:2.6_1: no ca āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati;
an8.72:2.9_6: ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te kāyena phusitvā vihareyyaṁ,
an8.72:2.9_7: āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an8.72:3.1_8: Ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te ca kāyena phusitvā viharati,
an8.72:3.3_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samantapāsādiko ca hoti sabbākāraparipūro cā”ti.

an8.74:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
an8.74:1.3_0: maraṇassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā.
an8.74:2.1_2: maraṇassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā?
an8.74:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divase nikkhante rattiyā patihitāya iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an8.74:2.4_0: ahi vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, vicchiko vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, satapadī vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya;
an8.74:2.5_0: tena me assa kālakiriyā. So mama assa antarāyo.
an8.74:2.7_0: tena me assa kālakiriyā. So mama assa antarāyo’ti.
an8.74:2.9_0: ‘atthi nu kho me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīnā ye me assu rattiṁ kālaṁ karontassa antarāyāyā’ti.
an8.74:3.1_0: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an8.74:3.2_0: ‘atthi me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīnā ye me assu rattiṁ kālaṁ karontassa antarāyāyā’ti, tena,
an8.74:3.2_2: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya adhimatto chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī
an8.74:3.2_3: ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca karaṇīyaṁ.
an8.74:4.1_2: ādittacelo vā ādittasīso vā tasseva celassa vā sīsassa vā nibbāpanāya adhimattaṁ chandañca vāyāmañca
an8.74:4.1_3: ussāhañca ussoḷhiñca appaṭivāniñca satiñca sampajaññañca kareyya;
an8.74:4.2_2: tena bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya adhimatto chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho
an8.74:4.2_3: ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca karaṇīyaṁ.

an8.76:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena kammaṭṭhānena jīvitaṁ kappeti—
an8.76:1.6_0: yadi kasiyā yadi vaṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena yadi issattena yadi rājaporisena yadi sippaññatarena—
an8.76:1.7_0: tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato, alaṁ kātuṁ alaṁ saṁvidhātunti.
an8.76:2.2_2: kulaputtassa bhogā honti uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatā bāhābalaparicitā sedāvakkhittā dhammikā dhammaladdhā te ārakkhena guttiyā sampādeti:
an8.76:3.2_2: kulaputto yasmiṁ gāme vā nigame vā paṭivasati,
an8.76:3.2_3: tattha ye te honti gahapatī vā gahapatiputtā vā daharā vā vuddhasīlino vuddhā vā vuddhasīlino saddhāsampannā sīlasampannā cāgasampannā paññāsampannā,
an8.76:3.2_4: tehi saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati;
an8.76:4.2_2: kulaputto āyañca bhogānaṁ viditvā vayañca bhogānaṁ viditvā samaṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti nāccogāḷhaṁ nātihīnaṁ:
an8.76:4.2_4: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.76:4.3_2: tulādhāro vā tulādhārantevāsī vā tulaṁ paggahetvā jānāti:
an8.76:4.4_2: kulaputto āyañca bhogānaṁ viditvā vayañca bhogānaṁ viditvā samaṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti nāccogāḷhaṁ nātihīnaṁ:
an8.76:4.4_4: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.76:4.5_2: kulaputto appāyo samāno uḷāraṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti,
an8.76:4.5_3: tassa bhavanti vattāro ‘udumbarakhādī vāyaṁ kulaputto bhoge khādatī’ti.
an8.76:4.6_2: kulaputto mahāyo samāno kasiraṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti,
an8.76:4.7_2: kulaputto āyañca bhogānaṁ viditvā vayañca bhogānaṁ viditvā samaṁ jīvikaṁ kappeti nāccogāḷhaṁ nātihīnaṁ:
an8.76:4.7_4: na ca me vayo āyaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
an8.76:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an8.76:5.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an8.76:8.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto paññavā hoti …pe… sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an8.77:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.77:1.3_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an8.77:2.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:2.5_0: Tassa uṭṭhahato, ghaṭato, vāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.77:2.6_0: So tena alābhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an8.77:3.1_0: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:3.3_0: Tassa uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.77:3.4_0: So tena lābhena majjati pamajjati pamādamāpajjati.
an8.77:3.5_2: uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca,
an8.77:4.1_0: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:4.2_0: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.77:4.3_0: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.

an8.77:5.3_0: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.77:5.4_0: So tena lābhena majjati pamajjati pamādamāpajjati.

an8.77:6.5_4: na ca socī na ca paridevī,

an8.78:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
an8.78:1.2_0: chahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:1.4_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:1.8_1: poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.78:1.9_0: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an8.78:1.10_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:2.1_0: Pañcahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:2.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:2.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:3.1_0: Catūhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:3.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:3.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:4.1_0: Catūhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:4.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:4.5_0: no ca dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.78:4.6_0: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.78:4.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:5.1_0: Tīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:5.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:5.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:6.1_0: Tīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:6.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:6.5_0: no ca dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.78:6.6_0: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.78:6.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:7.1_0: Dvīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:7.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:7.4_0: no ca sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.78:7.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:8.1_0: Dvīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:8.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:8.4_0: no ca sutānaṁ dhammānaṁ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.78:8.5_0: no ca dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.78:8.6_0: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.78:8.7_1: poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.78:8.8_0: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an8.78:8.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano”ti.
an8.79:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an8.79:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an8.79:2.1_0: Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
an8.79:2.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an8.80:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṁ kattabbaṁ hoti.
an8.80:1.5_1: Kammaṁ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilamissati.
an8.80:1.6_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṁ kataṁ hoti.
an8.80:2.3_0: ‘ahaṁ kho kammaṁ akāsiṁ. Kammaṁ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilanto. Handāhaṁ nipajjāmī’ti.
an8.80:2.4_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā maggo gantabbo hoti.
an8.80:3.3_1: Maggaṁ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilamissati.
an8.80:3.4_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā maggo gato hoti.
an8.80:4.3_0: ‘ahaṁ kho maggaṁ agamāsiṁ. Maggaṁ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilanto. Handāhaṁ nipajjāmī’ti.
an8.80:4.4_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:5.1_2: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:5.3_0: ‘ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:6.1_2: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:6.3_0: ‘ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:6.3_1: Tassa me kāyo garuko akammañño māsācitaṁ maññe.
an8.80:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako ābādho.
an8.80:7.3_0: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṁ appamattako ābādho atthi kappo nipajjituṁ. Handāhaṁ nipajjāmī’ti.
an8.80:8.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā.
an8.80:8.4_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:9.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṁ kattabbaṁ hoti.
an8.80:9.5_1: Kammaṁ kho mayā karontena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ.
an8.80:9.5_2: Handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an8.80:9.6_0: So vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṁ kataṁ hoti.
an8.80:10.3_1: Kammaṁ kho panāhaṁ karonto nāsakkhiṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ.
an8.80:10.3_2: Handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an8.80:11.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā maggo gantabbo hoti.
an8.80:11.3_1: Maggaṁ kho pana me gacchantena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ.
an8.80:12.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā maggo gato hoti.
an8.80:12.3_1: Maggaṁ kho panāhaṁ gacchanto nāsakkhiṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ.
an8.80:13.1_2: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:13.3_0: ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:14.1_2: bhikkhu gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:14.3_0: ahaṁ kho gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṁ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
an8.80:15.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako ābādho.
an8.80:15.3_0: uppanno kho me ayaṁ appamattako ābādho.
an8.80:15.3_1: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ vijjati yaṁ me ābādho pavaḍḍheyya.
an8.80:16.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā.
an8.80:16.3_1: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ vijjati yaṁ me ābādho paccudāvatteyya.
an8.80:16.3_2: Handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an8.80:16.4_0: So vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.81:1.1_0: “Satisampajaññe, bhikkhave, asati satisampajaññavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti hirottappaṁ.
an8.81:1.2_0: Hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti indriyasaṁvaro.
an8.81:1.3_0: Indriyasaṁvare asati indriyasaṁvaravipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti sīlaṁ.
an8.81:1.4_0: Sīle asati sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi.
an8.81:1.5_0: Sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ.
an8.81:1.6_0: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo.
an8.81:1.7_0: Nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an8.81:1.8_3: Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṁ gacchati, tacopi …
an8.81:1.9_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, satisampajaññe asati satisampajaññavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti hirottappaṁ;
an8.81:2.1_0: Satisampajaññe, bhikkhave, sati satisampajaññasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti hirottappaṁ.
an8.81:2.2_0: Hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti indriyasaṁvaro.
an8.81:2.3_0: Indriyasaṁvare sati indriyasaṁvarasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti sīlaṁ.
an8.81:2.4_0: Sīle sati sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi.
an8.81:2.5_0: Sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ.
an8.81:2.6_0: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo.
an8.81:2.7_0: Nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an8.81:2.9_2: satisampajaññe sati satisampajaññasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti hirottappaṁ;
an8.82:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.82:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā puṇṇiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.82:1.2_1: hetu ko paccayo yena appekadā tathāgataṁ dhammadesanā paṭibhāti,
an8.82:1.3_0: “Saddho ca, puṇṇiya, bhikkhu hoti, no cupasaṅkamitā;
an8.82:1.5_0: Yato ca kho, puṇṇiya, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, upasaṅkamitā ca;
an8.82:1.7_0: Saddho ca, puṇṇiya, bhikkhu hoti, upasaṅkamitā ca, no ca payirupāsitā …pe…
an8.82:1.9_0: paripucchitā ca, no ca ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti …
an8.82:1.10_0: ohitasoto ca dhammaṁ suṇāti, no ca sutvā dhammaṁ dhāreti …
an8.82:1.11_0: sutvā ca dhammaṁ dhāreti, no ca dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkhati …
an8.82:1.12_1: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an8.82:2.3_0: Imehi kho, puṇṇiya, aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgatā ekantapaṭibhānā tathāgataṁ dhammadesanā hotī”ti.
an8.83:2.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.83:2.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an8.83:2.7_0: evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ evaṁ byākareyyātha:
an8.83:2.9_0: evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ evaṁ byākareyyāthā”ti.
an8.84:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro khippaṁ pariyāpajjati, na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
an8.84:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro khippaṁ pariyāpajjati, na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
an8.84:2.1_0: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro na khippaṁ pariyāpajjati, ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
an8.84:2.4_2: aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro na khippaṁ pariyāpajjati,
an8.86:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena icchānaṅgalaṁ nāma kosalānaṁ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
an8.86:1.2_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
an8.86:1.4_0: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito icchānaṅgalaṁ anuppatto icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
an8.86:1.5_0: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an8.86:1.7_0: sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī’”ti.
an8.86:2.1_0: Atha kho icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā tassā rattiyā accayena pahutaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya yena icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an8.86:2.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgito bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
an8.86:2.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nāgitaṁ āmantesi:
an8.86:2.4_0: “ke pana te, nāgita, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
an8.86:2.5_1: icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā pahutaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā bhagavantaṁyeva uddissa bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti.
an8.86:2.6_0: “Māhaṁ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṁ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an8.86:2.7_1: nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an8.86:2.7_2: Yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.86:2.8_0: so taṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṁ sādiyeyyā”ti.
an8.86:3.3_1: bhagavā gamissati tanninnāva bhavissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an8.86:3.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathāninnaṁ udakāni pavattanti;
an8.86:3.5_1: yena yeneva dāni bhagavā gamissati tanninnāva bhavissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an8.86:4.1_0: “Māhaṁ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṁ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an8.86:4.2_1: nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an8.86:4.2_2: Yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an8.86:4.3_0: so taṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṁ sādiyeyya.
an8.86:5.1_1: ekaccā nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhiniyo assu akicchalābhiniyo akasiralābhiniyo,
an8.86:5.1_2: yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an8.86:5.2_0: Tumhākampi kho, nāgita, saṅgamma samāgamma saṅgaṇikavihāraṁ anuyuttānaṁ viharataṁ evaṁ hoti:
an8.86:5.3_0: ‘na hi nūname āyasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhino assu akicchalābhino akasiralābhino.
an8.86:5.3_1: Yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an8.86:5.4_0: Tathā hi paname āyasmanto saṅgamma samāgamma saṅgaṇikavihāraṁ anuyuttā viharanti’.
an8.86:6.1_0: Idhāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhū passāmi aññamaññaṁ aṅgulipatodakena sañjagghante saṅkīḷante.
an8.86:6.3_0: ‘na hi nūname āyasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhino assu akicchalābhino akasiralābhino.
an8.86:6.3_1: Yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an8.86:6.4_0: Tathā hi paname āyasmanto aññamaññaṁ aṅgulipatodakena sañjagghanti saṅkīḷanti’.
an8.86:7.1_1: bhikkhū passāmi yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutte viharante.
an8.86:7.3_0: ‘na hi nūname āyasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhino assu akicchalābhino akasiralābhino.
an8.86:7.3_1: Yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an8.86:7.4_0: Tathā hi paname āyasmanto yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyuttā viharanti’.
an8.86:8.1_0: Idhāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi gāmantavihāriṁ samāhitaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an8.86:8.3_0: ‘idāni imaṁ āyasmantaṁ ārāmiko vā upaṭṭhahissati samaṇuddeso vā. Taṁ tamhā samādhimhā cāvessatī’ti.
an8.86:8.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gāmantavihārena.
an8.86:9.1_0: Idha panāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi āraññikaṁ araññe pacalāyamānaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an8.86:9.3_0: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā imaṁ niddākilamathaṁ paṭivinodetvā araññasaññaṁyeva manasi karissati ekattan’ti.
an8.86:9.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an8.86:10.1_0: Idha panāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi āraññikaṁ araññe asamāhitaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an8.86:10.3_0: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā asamāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ samādahissati, samāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ anurakkhissatī’ti.
an8.86:10.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an8.86:11.1_0: Idha panāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi āraññikaṁ araññe samāhitaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an8.86:11.3_0: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuccissati, vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ anurakkhissatī’ti.
an8.86:11.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an8.86:12.2_0: So taṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ nikāmayamāno riñcati paṭisallānaṁ,
an8.86:12.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gāmantavihārena.
an8.86:13.2_0: So taṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ paṭipaṇāmetvā na riñcati paṭisallānaṁ,
an8.86:13.3_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an8.86:14.1_1: samaye addhānamaggappaṭipanno na kañci passāmi purato vā pacchato vā, phāsu me, nāgita,
an8.87:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pattaṁ nikkujjeyya.
an8.87:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pattaṁ nikkujjeyya.
an8.87:2.1_0: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pattaṁ ukkujjeyya.
an8.87:2.4_2: aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pattaṁ ukkujjeyyā”ti.
an8.88:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamānā upāsakā appasādaṁ pavedeyyuṁ.
an8.88:1.4_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamānā upāsakā appasādaṁ pavedeyyuṁ.
an8.88:2.1_0: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamānā upāsakā pasādaṁ pavedeyyuṁ.
an8.88:2.4_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamānā upāsakā pasādaṁ pavedeyyun”ti.
an8.89:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
an8.89:1.4_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho paṭisāraṇīyaṁ kammaṁ kareyya.
an8.89:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
an8.89:2.4_2: aṭṭhahi dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ paṭippassambheyyā”ti.
an8.90:1.1_0: “Tassapāpiyasikakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā aṭṭhasu dhammesu sammā vattitabbaṁ—
an8.90:1.3_0: Tassapāpiyasikakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā imesu aṭṭhasu dhammesu sammā vattitabban”ti.
an8.91-117:1.1_0: Atha kho bojjhā upāsikā, sirīmā, padumā, sutanā, manujā, uttarā, muttā, khemā, rucī, cundī, bimbī, sumanā, mallikā, tissā,
an8.118:1.4_0: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime aṭṭha dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti.
an8.119:1.3_0: Ajjhattaṁ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
an8.119:1.5_0: Ajjhattaṁ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
an8.119:1.6_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
an8.119:1.7_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
an8.119:1.8_0: Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni
an8.119:1.13_0: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime aṭṭha dhammā bhāvetabbā”.
an8.120:1.3_3: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati,
an8.120:1.3_4: sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati,
an8.120:1.3_5: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati,
an8.120:1.3_6: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati,
an8.120:1.3_7: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati—
an8.120:1.4_0: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime aṭṭha dhammā bhāvetabbā”.
